column1: English: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge. = simplified Chinese: 质子带有正电，中子不带电。电子带有负电。 ### English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 挪威、瑞典和新西兰也有类似的情况，但在其他方面很是独特（例如，在荷兰，这个数字是一比四十）。
column3: 挪威、瑞典和新西兰的这一比例与我国相同，但其他国家则相差很大，例如荷兰的比例是一比四十。

column1: English: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic. = simplified Chinese: 当种群中的所有个体在某一特定表型性状上完全相同时，就称之为单型。 ### English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如果参观的是精心布置的园林，收集“标本”也会被驱逐，没有商量余地。
column3: 如果去一个正式安排的花园，收集“标本”也会让你被赶出来，没有商量的余地。

column1: English: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). = simplified Chinese: 在白天最热的时候，旅行者们可以体验到由水（或其他东西）所形成的错觉——海市蜃楼。 ### English: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 阿姆斯特丹市政府和安妮·弗兰克博物馆 (Anne Frank Museum) 的官员表示，这棵树感染了一种真菌，并会对公众健康造成威胁，因为据称它随时都有倒下的危险。
column3: 阿姆斯特丹市和安妮·弗兰克博物馆的官员们说，这棵树感染了真菌，对公众健康构成了威胁，因为他们认为这棵树即将倒塌。

column1: English: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated. = simplified Chinese: “我们都非常震惊，”这位母亲表示。 ### English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 前往课征重税的国家/地区的旅客有时可以省下一大笔钱，在这些地方购买酒水和烟草等产品特别划算。
column3: 前往税率较高的国家的旅客有时可以节省一大笔钱，尤其是酒类和烟草等产品。

column1: English: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy". = simplified Chinese: 媒体公司照例撒谎以掩盖其目的，声称这是为了“防止盗版”。 ### English: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 研究该疾病的联合国专家丹妮尔·拉塔涅 (Danielle Lantagne) 表示，疫情爆发很可能是由维和人员引起的。
column3: 联合国埃博拉专家丹尼尔·兰坦尼说，这次疫情很可能是由于维和人员造成的。

column1: English: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain. = simplified Chinese: 现在来看日本。和英国一样，日本是一个岛国。 ### English: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 虽然在洪水过后，水位只会上升几英尺，但官员们希望这足以恢复下游被侵蚀的沙洲。
column3: 虽然洪水过后，水位只会上涨几英尺，但官员们希望这足以恢复下游被侵蚀的沙洲。

column1: English: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. = simplified Chinese: 以最少击球次数或挥棒次数完成比赛的选手获胜。 ### English: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 鉴于成员的年龄、种族、阶级、位置以及/或性别差异，亚文化可能会各具特色。
column3: 次级文化可以因为成员的年龄、种族、阶级、地理位置、性别而与主流文化有所不同。

column1: English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. = simplified Chinese: 幸存者弗朗齐歇克·科瓦尔说：“终于有一块玻璃碎了，他们开始从窗户逃出去。” ### English: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他曾为瑞典和其他 28 个国家/地区制作过 1000 多版邮票。
column3: 他为瑞典和28个其他国家生产了1000多枚邮票。

column1: English: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. = simplified Chinese: 与普通旅游签证或商务签证相比，学生签证通常有不同的要求和申请程序。 ### English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 美国联邦航空局 (FAA) 称，新一代航空运输系统 (NextGen) 可以使飞机缩短飞行航线，每年节省数百万加仑的燃料，并减少碳排放。
column3: NextGen是FAA声称将允许飞机飞更短的航线，每年节省数百万加仑的燃料，并减少碳排放的系统。

column1: English: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. = simplified Chinese: 今天，A1GP 新西兰队副驾驶约翰·里德 (Jonny Reid) 在合法驾驶的情况下，成为在有 48 年历史的新西兰奥克兰海港大桥上行驶最快的人，从而创造了历史。 ### English: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 早些时候的报道称，这架飞机被拒绝在乌鲁木齐紧急降落后，已返回阿富汗。
column3: 初步报告显示，这架飞机在乌鲁木齐被拒绝降落后，被要求返回阿富汗。

column1: English: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition. = simplified Chinese: 现代击剑运动分为多个级别：有大学学生初步学习的级别，也有专业和奥林匹克竞技的级别。 ### English: Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said that there was no Tsunami indication. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 而且太平洋海啸预警中心（Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center）也表示并未发现海啸迹象。
column3: 太平洋海啸预警中心也说没有海啸迹象。

column1: English: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. = simplified Chinese: 然而，他重申了先前的声明，即罗伊诉韦德案（Roe v. Wade）是“美国的既定法律”，并强调最高法院作出一致性裁决的重要性。 ### English: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 但在队长输掉三柱门后，印度在结束这一局的比赛时只得了 36 分，输掉 7 个三柱门。
column3: 但是，在队长出局后，印度只得到36分，输掉了7分，以结束本场比赛。

column1: English: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy". = simplified Chinese: “注意力缺失症“是一种神经系统综合症，三种典型的限定症状包括冲动、注意力分散、多动或精力过剩。 ### English: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 她的第一个项目是障碍滑雪，并在第一回合以“未完成”的成绩结束比赛。该比赛 116 名参赛者中有 36 人取得了相同的成绩。
column3: 她在第一个项目——大回转中，在第一次滑行中就获得了“未完赛”的成绩。在116名参赛选手中，有36名选手获得了同样的成绩。

column1: English: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November. = simplified Chinese: 抗议者希望在请愿书上收集 120 万个签名，并在十一月提交给国民议会。 ### English: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon". = simplified Chinese:
column2: 1940 年 8 月 15 日，盟军攻入法国南部，这次进攻被称为“龙骑兵行动”。
column3: 1940 年 8 月 15 日，盟军入侵法国南部，入侵行动被称为 "龙骑兵行动"。

column1: English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. = simplified Chinese: 幸存者弗朗齐歇克·科瓦尔说：“终于有一块玻璃碎了，他们开始从窗户逃出去。” ### English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如今，科学表明，这种大规模的碳经济，再也无法让过去 200 万年来支持人类进化发展的生物圈保持稳定状态。
column3: 科学现在表明，这种大规模的碳经济已经把生物圈从过去两百万年以来一直支持人类进化的稳定状态中拉了出来。

column1: English: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. = simplified Chinese: 很多人对野生动物摄影习以为常，但就像普通摄影作品一样，一张照片胜过千言万语。 ### English: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 事故发生的道路暂时封闭，紧急救援人员将司机从红色奥迪 TT 中救了出来。
column3: 事故发生地附近道路暂时封闭，消防人员将红色奥迪TT车内被困司机救出。

column1: English: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. = simplified Chinese: 维多利亚瀑布镇是津巴布韦西部的一个小镇，与赞比亚的利文斯通接壤，靠近博茨瓦纳。 ### English: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 几千年前，一个叫阿里斯塔克斯的人曾说，太阳系围绕着太阳旋转。
column3: 数千年前，一个叫亚里士多德的男人说太阳系围绕太阳运行。

column1: English: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours. = simplified Chinese: 龙卷风能将树木连根拔起，将建筑物上的木板撕下，把汽车抛向天空。龙卷风中的百分之二最为猛烈，能持续肆虐三小时以上。 ### English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 每个人都能达到开悟的境界，而实现它的唯一阻碍是我们自己的紧张感和消极情绪。
column3: 每个人都能开悟。阻碍我们开悟的，只有我们自己的紧张和消极。

column1: English: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. = simplified Chinese: 希腊著名律师萨基斯·科查吉欧格鲁 (Sakis Kechagioglou) 和乔治·尼可拉考普洛斯 (George Nikolakopoulos) 因被判贪污和腐败被关押在雅典的 Korydallus 监狱。 ### English: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 为什么一个组织要花这么长时间来建立学习型组织呢？将组织学习的概念付诸实践的目标之一就是创新。
column3: 为什么一个组织要花费时间去建立学习型组织？一个建立学习型组织的目标就是创新。

column1: English: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. = simplified Chinese: 下一张图片显示的是原子发射光子的情况。当然，实际上光子要比图片上的样子小得多。 ### English: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 802.11n 的速度大大快于前代技术，最大理论吞吐量可达 600Mbit/s。
column3: 802.11n的传输速度比其前辈们要快得多，理论最大传输速度可达600Mbit/s。

column1: English: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November. = simplified Chinese: 抗议者希望在请愿书上收集 120 万个签名，并在十一月提交给国民议会。 ### English: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 北岸海滩（位于北港区内）在太平洋上，从北部的长湾 (Long Bay) 一直延伸到南部的德文波特 (Devonport)。
column3: 北岸海滩（北港区）位于太平洋上，从北面的长湾延伸到南面的德文波特。

column1: English: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. = simplified Chinese: 伦敦约有 200 人在主要的版权持有者的办公室外抗议。 ### English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 有些场地免费提供酒精饮料。然而，醉酒会削弱人的判断能力，所有优秀的赌徒都知道保持清醒的重要性。
column3: 一些场所提供免费酒水。然而，醉酒会使人丧失理智，而所有好的赌徒都知道保持清醒的重要性。

column1: English: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. = simplified Chinese: 伊拉克的阿布格莱布监狱在一次暴乱中着火。 ### English: Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 女性应该意识到文化差异可能会导致她们所认为的骚扰行为；而且被人尾随、抓胳膊等情况并不少见。
column3: 妇女应该认识到文化差异可能造成她们认为的骚扰，被跟踪、被拉手臂等事并不少见。

column1: English: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. = simplified Chinese: 第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战期间都使用了潜水艇。 那时它们的速度很慢，射击范围也非常有限。 ### English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 因为地壳更薄，所以近的一面可能会有更多的阴暗部，熔岩更容易上升到地表。
column3: 火山口附近可能还有更多的海岛，因为那里的地壳更薄。 熔岩更容易喷发到海面。

column1: English: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. = simplified Chinese: 世界园艺博览会是展示花卉、植物园和与植物有关的一切。 ### English: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 其他的包括利文斯顿岛和欺骗岛。在那里，一个仍然活跃的火山口被洪水淹没，提供了一个壮观的天然港口。
column3: 其他包括利文斯顿岛和欺骗岛，后者是淹没的火山口，现在仍然活跃，形成了一个壮观的自然港湾。

column1: English: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation. = simplified Chinese: 他给当地大学的学生发送邮件后，提供免费住宿的邀请蜂拥而至。 ### English: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 赏樱，亦称“花见”（hanami），从 8 世纪开始就成为了日本习俗。
column3: 赏樱花，即花见，在日本已有八百年历史。

column1: English: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. = simplified Chinese: 虽然规模较小，但它让一些年长的游客联想到建州之前的夏威夷，当时还没有这么多大型观光酒店和其他开发项目。 ### English: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 研究人员观察到，在添加三聚氰胺和三聚氰尿酸后，猫的尿液中形成了结晶。
column3: 研究人员观察到猫尿中加入三聚氰胺和氰尿酸后形成的晶体。

column1: English: Zayat was unhurt in the accident. = simplified Chinese: 遭遇事故的扎亚特没有受伤。 ### English: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 然而，司机的头部受到了重创。
column3: 然而，司机头部严重受伤。

column1: English: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold. = simplified Chinese: 许多建筑物的外观都很漂亮，无论是从高楼上看去，还是从一个位置巧妙的窗口望出去，都会看到一幅美不胜收的景象。 ### English: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 已知的第一种交通方式是步行。200 万年前，随着直立人（Homo Erectus，意思是直立的人）的出现，人类开始直立行走。
column3: 最早的交通方式是步行，两百万年前，直立人(Homo Erectus)的出现标志着人类开始直立行走。

column1: English: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse. = simplified Chinese: 如果你想帮助别人时受伤，你只会使事情变得更糟。 ### English: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 很早的时候就引进了轨枕，用于固定铁轨。但是，人们逐渐意识到，如果在铁轨上放上铁片，铁轨会更稳固有效。
column3: 早期的铁路轨道的横木是用来固定铁轨的。然而，人们逐渐意识到，如果铁轨上有一层铁皮，火车会跑得更快。

column1: English: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. = simplified Chinese: 母语人数取决于紧密相关的方言是否计算在内。 ### English: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 与此同时，以 U 型潜艇为主力的德国海军试图拦截这场运输。
column3: 同时，德国海军使用U型潜艇试图阻止这种贸易。

column1: English: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. = simplified Chinese: 严寒也许是没有准备的人将面临的唯一真正的危险。 ### English: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 塔马基大道 (Tamaki Drive) 海滩位于怀特玛塔港 (Waitemata Harbour)，就在奥克兰中部的米森湾 (Mission Bay) 和圣赫里尔斯 (St Heliers) 的高档郊区。
column3: 塔玛基海滩位于怀特玛塔港，在奥克兰市中心的梅西和圣海丽尔郊区。

column1: English: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. = simplified Chinese: 许多情绪稳定、能力较强的旅客都曾被在发展中国家旅行的新问题所吓倒，在那里，需要迅速适应接踵而至的许多细微文化差异。 ### English: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 宇宙中的一切都由物质构成，而所有的物质都由被称为原子的微小粒子组成。
column3: 宇宙万物都是由物质构成的。所有的物质都是由微小的粒子——原子构成的。

column1: English: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism. = simplified Chinese: 细胞是各类生物体中最小的结构和功能单位。 ### English: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 多名人质获救，目前至少有六名人质确认遇难。
column3: 已有数名人质被救出，目前确认至少六人死亡。

column1: English: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. = simplified Chinese: 鞋纹应该足够深，在5 毫米（1/5英寸）或以上；材料应在低温下足够柔软。 ### English: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如今，唯一不能向后折叠翅膀的昆虫是蜻蜓和蜉蝣。
column3: 今天，唯一不能折叠翅膀的昆虫是蜻蜓和豆娘。

column1: English: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. = simplified Chinese: 有的靴子有鞋钉；也有为湿滑路面设计的、带有鞋钉的扩展装备，适用于大多数鞋子和靴子，能装在鞋跟上，或同时装在鞋跟和鞋底上。 ### English: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 2002 年，戈马被尼拉贡戈火山的熔岩所摧毁。火山熔岩掩埋了该镇的大部分街道，尤其是镇中心。
column3: 2002年，戈马被尼拉贡戈火山的熔岩摧毁，火山熔岩几乎完全掩埋了戈马市的大部分街道，特别是市中心。

column1: English: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan. = simplified Chinese: 印度河流域文明是青铜时代的文明，位于印度西北部次大陆，覆盖的区域包括了现代巴基斯坦的大部分地区，以及印度西北部和阿富汗东北部的一些地区。 ### English: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这是亨利·路易斯·盖茨 (Henry Louis Gates) 在美国公共广播公司的《非洲世界的奇迹》特别节目中的重要一站。
column3: 它是亨利路易斯盖茨在PBS的特别节目“非洲奇迹”中一个重要的停留点。

column1: English: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. = simplified Chinese: 他当时正在球队的酒店下榻，为星期天迎战博洛尼亚队做准备。 ### English: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 月球的表面由岩石和灰尘组成。月球的外层叫做地壳。
column3: 月球表面是由岩石和尘土组成的。月球的外层叫做“月壳”。

column1: English: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning. = simplified Chinese: 有些降雨会伴随雷暴和频繁的闪电。 ### English: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago" = simplified Chinese:
column2: 由于日本的岛屿群众多，日本从地质学角度上常被称为“列岛”
column3: 由于日本群岛的群集，日本常被称为"群岛"。

column1: English: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. = simplified Chinese: 三个赛季前，28岁的比达尔（Vidal）从塞维利亚队加盟巴萨。 ### English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 由于小气候、土壤和海拔高度的多样性，这里的植物群落种类非常丰富，并因此闻名于世。
column3: 它的植物群落种类繁多，原因在于其气候、土壤和海拔的差异。

column1: English: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. = simplified Chinese: 开始旅行写作最简单的方法就是在一个资深旅行博客网站上磨练你的技能。 ### English: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 赫希及崔斯（Hershey and Chase）的实验，是说明 DNA 是遗传物质的主要迹象依据之一。
column3: 赫尔希和蔡斯实验是DNA是遗传物质的一个主要证据。

column1: English: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident. = simplified Chinese: 10 月 7 日，一台发动机在飞机起飞时脱离，未造成人员伤亡。该事故后，俄罗斯短暂停飞了伊尔-76。 ### English: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 大桥预计将于 2017 年 9 月全面投入使用，届时巴西海关检查站预计也将完工。
column3: 该桥计划于 2017 年 9 月全面投入使用，届时巴西海关检查站预计将完工。

column1: English: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport. = simplified Chinese: 保持健康的能量平衡，坚持有效补充水分的习惯，了解合理使用营养补品的各个方面，能够帮助运动员们改善表现，增加运动乐趣。 ### English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 人们可能想不到，旅行者在回程中也需要耐心和理解。
column3: 人们可能没有意识到，耐心和理解也是归国旅客们所需要的。

column1: English: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride." = simplified Chinese: 被困在过山车上的每分每秒都很不舒服，可以毫不夸张地说，我们花了至少一个小时才把第一个人从过山车上救下来。” ### English: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 由于一天只颁发十八块奖牌，许多国家的运动员未能登上领奖台。
column3: 每个国家每天只能得到十八枚奖牌，因此，许多国家的运动员都未能登上奖牌榜。”

column1: English: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. = simplified Chinese: 开始旅行写作最简单的方法就是在一个资深旅行博客网站上磨练你的技能。 ### English: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 努力游往你不会再次被困住的地方，或者等待救援（取决于你的技能以及你是否已被发现）。
column3: 试着瞄准一个你不会再次被捕获的地方，或者，根据你的技能和是否被注意到，你可能会等待救援。

column1: English: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. = simplified Chinese: 公园管理局只发出预计到访日期之前一个月以内的公园许可证。 ### English: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s. = simplified Chinese: 尽管一些学者推测，鉴于这一文明也存在于如今已然干涸的萨拉斯瓦蒂河流域，将该文明称为“印度河-萨拉斯瓦蒂河文明”才算恰如其分，不过一些人称其为“哈拉帕文明”——得名于20世纪20年代在该区域发掘的第一个遗址“哈拉帕”。 ### English: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 要了解圣殿骑士，就必须了解促使圣殿骑士团成立的背景。
column3: 要了解圣殿骑士团，就必须了解促使该团成立的背景。

column1: English: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses. = simplified Chinese: 非法烈酒可能含有包括甲醇在内的各种危险杂质，即使小剂量也会导致失明或死亡。 ### English: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 因此，一个组织在共同努力克服障碍的过程中，往往会带来新的创新流程，以满足客户的需求。
column3: 因此，一个组织共同克服障碍的过程可以导致一种新的创新过程来满足客户的需求。

column1: English: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.) = simplified Chinese: 学习制作互动媒体需要常规传统技能，以及在互动课程中掌握的工具（故事板制作、音频和视频编辑、故事情节设计等）。 ### English: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在 20 世纪 20 年代，大多市民的主流态度是和平主义的、分离主义的。
column3: 在20世纪20年代，大多数公民和国家的普遍态度是和平主义和孤立主义。

column1: English: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem. = simplified Chinese: 每晚快速眼动期 (REM) 越短，在这种状态下睡个好觉、恢复元气的频率就越少，身体可能会出问题。 ### English: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 巴黎人是出了名的以自我中心、粗鲁和傲慢。
column3: 巴黎人自负、粗鲁、傲慢。

column1: English: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. = simplified Chinese: 18 世纪的柬埔寨被夹在泰国和越南两个强邻之间。 ### English: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 然而，由于文化交流迟缓，西方的时尚可能落后 25 到 30 年。
column3: 然而，由于缓慢的通信渠道，西方的风格可能落后于25至30年。

column1: English: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions. = simplified Chinese: 美国计划从三个不同的方向发动协同攻击。 ### English: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. = simplified Chinese: 这座城市是三大一神宗教——犹太教、基督教和伊斯兰教的圣地，是一个真正的精神、宗教和文化中心。 ### English: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 条件良好的时候，你可以比步行走得更远——但只有在极少数情况下，你才能获得与不背着沉重背包、在平整的轨道上越野滑雪相同的速度。

column1: English: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning. = simplified Chinese: 有些降雨会伴随雷暴和频繁的闪电。 ### English: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal." = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. = simplified Chinese: 没有人比博贝克 (Bobek) 的出场次数更多、为俱乐部进球得分更多的了。 ### English: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. = simplified Chinese: 白令海峡经由奥内加湖（Lake Onega）、拉多加湖（Lake Ladoga）和圣彼得堡（Saint Petersburg）连接北冰洋和波罗的海，连接处多数是河流和湖泊。 ### English: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 全年都有很多人到大堡礁旅游，而且在大堡礁很少发生由于参加上述任何活动而受伤的情况。

column1: English: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. = simplified Chinese: 直升机救出了 12 名船员，其中只有一人受伤，鼻骨骨折。 ### English: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. column1: English: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. = simplified Chinese: 18 世纪的柬埔寨被夹在泰国和越南两个强邻之间。 ### English: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle. = simplified Chinese: 作为那段时期的典型建筑，与其说克尔比墨斯鲁（Muxloe）城堡是一座真正的城堡，不如说它是一座加固的房屋。 ### English: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. = simplified Chinese: 在亚美尼亚的支持下，一个新共和国诞生了。然而，它没有得到任何国家（包括亚美尼亚）的正式承认。 ### English: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. = simplified Chinese: 它是一个由 15 个岛屿组成的群岛，分布在 220 万平方公里的海面上。 ### English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. column1: English: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points. = simplified Chinese: 双方在主要的半决赛中较量。努萨以 11 分的优势获胜。 ### English: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. = simplified Chinese: 鉴于许多普韦布洛人居住得非常偏远，你得前往阿尔伯克基或圣达菲才能享受到丰富的夜生活。 ### English: They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. = simplified Chinese: 以最少击球次数或挥棒次数完成比赛的选手获胜。 ### English: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis. = simplified Chinese: 1970 年，医学博士兼研究科学家雷蒙德·达马迪安 (Raymond Damadian) 发现了使用磁共振成像作为医学诊断工具的基础原理。 ### English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 全天都有公交车从城区间公交站（跨河）发车，但大部分车次，特别是开往东部和贾卡尔/布姆唐的公交车都在 06:30 至 07:30 之间发车。
column3: 巴士从跨河长途汽车站 ( 河对岸 ) 出发，全天都有车，但大多数，特别是去往东边和 Jakar/Bumthang 的车，在 06:30-07:30 之间发车。

column1: English: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated. = simplified Chinese: “我们都非常震惊，”这位母亲表示。 ### English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona. = simplified Chinese:
column2: “它们的热行为不像地球上的大型洞穴那么稳定，这些大型洞穴通常会保持相当恒定的温度，但它们与地下深穴的情况很相似，”亚利桑那州旗杆镇美国地质调查局 (USGS) 太空地质团队和北亚利桑那大学的格伦·库欣说道。

column1: English: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. = simplified Chinese: 除非你是外交官，否则在海外工作一般需要向所在国家/地区缴纳所得税。 ### English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people. = simplified Chinese:

column2: 每年，数十名游客都会因未能保持适当距离而受伤。这些动物体型庞大，充满野性，具有潜在的危险性，因此请给它们留出一些空间。
column3: 每年，数十名游客因为没有保持适当的距离而受伤。这些动物是大型，野生的，并且可能具有危险性，所以请给他们空间。

column1: English: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. = simplified Chinese: 在过去三十年里，尽管官方层面仍然是个共产主义国家，中国已经发展了市场经济。 ### English: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 航空公司非常清楚，有一些核心乘客愿花高价获得快速、舒适出行的特权，因此航空公司会相应地收取费用。
column3: 航空公司知道，有一群愿意支付高价以获得快速舒适的旅行方式的乘客，他们也相应地收取高价。

column1: English: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. = simplified Chinese: 某些此类应用程序甚至让用户把智能手机对着现实世界中的标志或其他物体，就能翻译上面的外语文字。 ### English: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 医院遵循了感染控制规定，包括把患者与他人隔离，以防感染到其他人。
column3: 医院已经按照感染控制程序，将患者与其他人隔离开来，以防止可能感染其他人。

column1: English: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. = simplified Chinese: 我们中有很多人，都发现自己观看的电视节目在告诉我们某种过程或经验，但我们却永远不会参与或应用这些知识。 ### English: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants." = simplified Chinese:
column2: 钱伯斯曾起诉上帝，称其应对“地球上数十亿居民中到处可见的死亡、破坏和恐怖”负责。
column3: 切姆斯菲尔德起诉上帝，因为“上帝造成了数百万地球居民的大规模死亡、破坏和恐怖”。

column1: English: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. = simplified Chinese: 泰国人在 18 世纪曾多次入侵柬埔寨，并在 1772 年摧毁了金边。 ### English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如果你要访问的国家受到旅行警告的约束，你的旅行健康保险或旅行取消保险可能会受到影响。
column3: 如果您要去的国家发布旅行警告，您的旅行健康保险或您的旅行取消保险可能会受到影响。

column1: English: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. = simplified Chinese: 据说扎布隆·阿旺·纳姆耶尔 (Zhabdrung nawang Namgyel) 于 1649 年建造这座堡垒，是为了纪念自己战胜藏蒙军队。 ### English: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在宽阔的林荫大道、玻璃外墙的建筑和现代化的购物中心之间，散布着传统的红瓦屋顶、18 世纪的市场以及古老的清真寺和教堂，不过这座城市比传统的土耳其更有地中海欧洲的氛围。
column3: 宽阔的林荫大道、玻璃幕墙的现代建筑和现代购物中心点缀着传统的红瓦屋顶、18 世纪市场和古老的清真寺和教堂，尽管这座城市更像地中海欧洲而不是传统的土耳其。

column1: English: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. = simplified Chinese: 11 点 20 分，警察要求抗议者退回到人行道，并告知抗议者，在行使抗议权利时，务必考虑到越来越拥堵的公共交通问题。 ### English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 来自美国普林斯顿大学和瑞典乌普萨拉大学的研究人员报告称，由于当地特有的达尔文雀中的勇地雀和外来的仙人掌大嘴地雀之间的繁殖，这个新物种只进化了两代，尽管人们认为这一过程需要更长的时间。
column3: 美国普林斯顿大学和瑞典乌普萨拉大学的研究人员报告说，新物种在仅仅两代人的时间里就进化了，尽管这种进化过程被认为需要更长的时间，因为达尔文雀的本地品种，吉氏凤头鹦鹉，与入侵的仙人掌鹦鹉杂交。

column1: English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year. = simplified Chinese: 250 年后，健力士已经成长为年营业额 100 亿欧元（147亿美元）的全球性企业。 ### English: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在这个迷人的村庄漫步半小时是值得的。

About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce. = simplified Chinese: 2007年9月17日，纳迪亚在俄罗斯阿莱克斯的一家妇产科诊所的剖腹产出生，体重达17磅1盎司。 ### English: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. = simplified Chinese: 这支舰队由奥拉夫·特里格瓦松率领。他是挪威人，志在将挪威从丹麦手中夺回来。 ### English: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. = simplified Chinese: 紧随其后的是伊斯坦布尔国家交响乐团 (Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra)、一支禁卫军乐队以及歌手法提赫·埃尔科克 (Fatih Erkoc) 和穆斯林·古尔斯 (Muslum Gurses)。 ### English: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. = simplified Chinese: 随后会提供一份纸质版和/或在线版名单，将尚有空房的房东一一列出，有时会标明其他旅客的推荐和评价信息。 ### English: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. = simplified Chinese: 自创办以来，《洋葱报》已经成为一个名副其实的讽刺戏仿类新闻帝国，旗下拥有印刷刊物、网站（10 月份吸引了 500 万独立访问者）、个人广告、24 小时新闻网络、播客，以及近期推出的名为《我们的愚蠢世界》的世界地图集。 ### English: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 互联网结合了大众传播和人际传播的要素。

column1: English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. = simplified Chinese: 费利西亚 （Felicia） 曾经是萨菲尔-辛普森 （Saffir-Simpson） 飓风级别的 4 级风暴，周二消散前减弱为热带低气压。 ### English: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: French law was changed. column2: 其他基于生物节律的选择包括睡前大量饮用液体（尤其是水或茶——众所周知有利尿作用），强迫自己起来小便。
column3: 其他基于生物钟的选项包括睡前多喝水（特别是水或茶，一种众所周知的利尿剂），迫使一个人起床去上厕所。

column1: English: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets. = simplified Chinese: 澳大利亚前保守党政府拒绝签署《京都议定书》，声称由于澳大利亚严重依赖煤炭出口，该协议会削弱澳大利亚的经济，而印度和中国等国却未受排放目标的约束。 ### English: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 锦标赛头号种子南非队开局不错，他们以 26 - 00 轻松战胜了 5 号种子赞比亚队。
column3: 锦标赛头号种子南非队以26比0轻松战胜第五号种子赞比亚队，开了一个好头。

column1: English: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. = simplified Chinese: 总统内务大臣罗德里戈·阿里亚斯表示，阿里亚斯的检测结果呈阳性，为轻度病毒感染。 ### English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在 1976 年总统选举期间，他为卡特提供了对外政策方面的建议，随后在 1977 到 1981 年接替亨利·基辛格担任国家安全顾问 (NSA) 。
column3: 在1976年总统竞选期间，他担任卡特外交政策顾问，1977年至1981年担任国家安全顾问，接替亨利·基辛格。

column1: English: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. = simplified Chinese: 今天红湖社区为杰夫·韦斯 (Jeff Weise) 和九名受害者中的三人举行葬礼时有消息称，另一名与 3 月 21 日校园枪击案有关的学生已被捕。 ### English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 迄今为止，船运是跨洋运输大量人员和货物的最有效方式。
column3: 船运是运送大量人员和货物横跨海洋的最有效方式。

column1: English: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such. = simplified Chinese: 如果要去野营，请带上露营床或吊床，以免蛇和蝎子之类的危害。 ### English: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 联军和阿富汗部队进入该地区保护阵地，其他联军飞机也被派往支援。
column3: 盟军和阿富汗部队进入该地区，以保护现场和其他盟军飞机被派往协助。

column1: English: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. = simplified Chinese: 在吃树干之前，三角龙会用它强有力的喙嘴剥去树叶。 ### English: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 1963 年大坝建成后，季节性洪水被控制住了，沉积物不再冲散到河流里。
column3: 建成大坝后，洪水不再冲走河床上的泥沙。

column1: English: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today". = simplified Chinese: 在他时长 2 小时的演讲中，他声称：“现在苹果要重新发明手机，我们现在要创造历史。” ### English: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 亚马逊河是世界上第二长，也是最大的河流。 它的水量是第二大河流的 8 倍以上。
column3: 亚马逊河是地球上第二长、第二大的河流。它携带的水量是第二大的河流的八倍。

column1: English: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. = simplified Chinese: 涉事飞行员是空军中队长迪罗里·帕塔维 (Dilokrit Pattavee)。 ### English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他们因其严格防守、控球技术和出色的团队合作脱颖而出。很显然，这是一支无往不胜的球队。
column3: 他们的纪律严明的防守，良好的控球能力和出色的团队合作，使他们脱颖而出，这显然是球队要击败。

column1: English: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”. = simplified Chinese: 1977 年，达马迪安（Damadian）博士完成了第一台 “全身” 核磁共振扫描仪的制造，他称之为 “不屈号”。 ### English: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在印度北部和巴基斯坦的内陆地区，咖喱中常常使用酸奶；而在印度南部和次大陆其他一些沿海地区，则常常使用椰奶。
column3: 在印度北部和巴基斯坦内陆地区，酸奶经常被用于咖喱中；而在印度南部和印度次大陆的一些沿海地区，椰奶经常被用于咖喱中。

column1: English: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. = simplified Chinese: 此后不久，《亚特兰大宪法报》发表了一份报告，指出了检测结果存在的问题。 ### English: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这些理论表明，当人们成熟到一定程度进入成年时，某些需求和/或欲望就被内化了。
column3: 这些理论认为，人们在成长过程中会形成某些需要或欲望，这些需要或欲望会随着他们成年而内化。

column1: English: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. = simplified Chinese: 在测绘海床后，借助遥控无人潜水器 (ROV) 找到了沉船。 ### English: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 请确认你打算乘坐的公交车将会进入希伯伦，而不仅仅是去附近的基亚特·阿巴 (Kiryat Arba) 犹太定居点。
column3: 检查一下你所考虑乘坐的巴士是否开往希伯伦，而不是开往附近的犹太人定居点基里亚特阿巴。

column1: English: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. = simplified Chinese: 只有少数几家航空公司扔提供丧亲票价，这比为赶赴葬礼的临时出行稍微便宜一些。 ### English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 作为大家庭里的姐妹和女儿，雌性之间通常彼此关系密切。
column3: 女性通常彼此关系密切，她们是一大家子姐妹和女儿。

column1: English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. = simplified Chinese: 如果连拍照都不允许的话，就更不用想拍摄视频了。 ### English: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 赌场一般会想方设法让客人花费尽量多的时间和金钱。赌场通常没有窗户和时钟，出口也很难找到。
column3: 赌场通常都会想方设法让客人多花钱，所以通常没有窗户，而且时钟也很少见，出口也很难找。

column1: English: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry. = simplified Chinese: 他们从致命的十字弓中射出的利箭，能穿透敌军的盔甲。公元前 1000 年前后，亚述人使用了第一批骑兵。 ### English: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 北部，或者说森蒂纳尔岭，拥有南极洲最高的山脉文森山脉，最高峰是 4892 米的文森峰。
column3: 位于南极点附近的南极山脉北部，有南极洲的最高峰，海拔 4892 米的文森峰。

column1: English: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. = simplified Chinese: 注意：对来自其他州的游客而言，这里的小镇酒吧并不总是闲逛的好地方。 ### English: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 莫尔 (Moll) 博士认为，有些病人可能是在医院感染了病菌，而且至少有两名病人是医院的医护人员。
column3: 一些病人可能是在医院里染上这种病的，莫尔医生认为，至少有两个病人是医院里的医务人员。

column1: English: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. = simplified Chinese: 土耳其歌剧女歌唱家茜泽·阿克苏 （Sezen Aksu）与意大利男高音亚历山德罗·沙费纳（Alessandro Safina）和希腊歌手哈里斯·阿莱克修（Haris Alexiou）同台表演。 ### English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 虽然马拉轨道车只是由平行的木板拼成，但在当时，就略显坎坷的道路而言，这些车能让拉车的马跑得更快，拉得更多。
column3: 虽然马车路只是由平行木板铺成的，但它们允许马匹拉着它们以比当时略微粗糙的道路上更高的速度和更大的负载行驶。

column1: English: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. = simplified Chinese: 如果你愿意，请想象一个曼彻斯特人、一个波士顿人、一个牙买加人和一个悉尼人围坐在多伦多的一家餐馆里吃饭。 ### English: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这是马特利 (Martelly) 四年来第五次入选海地临时选举委员会 (CEP)。
column3: 这是马提尔第五次担任 CEP，任期四年。

column1: English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year. = simplified Chinese: 250 年后，健力士已经成长为年营业额 100 亿欧元（147亿美元）的全球性企业。 ### English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 杜瓦尔已婚，有两个已经成年的孩子，他并没有给故事的讲述者米勒留下太大印象。
column3: 杜瓦尔，已婚，有两个成年子女，对米勒没有留下深刻印象，米勒是听别人讲的这个故事。

column1: English: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. = simplified Chinese: 如果你的旅行时间有富余，请查看前往非洲的总票价跟环球旅行票价的比较情况。 ### English: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 自 2011 年以来，由于一些选举未能如期举行而引发了这些抗议活动，有时抗议还会升级为暴力事件。
column3: 抗议活动有时会演变成暴力冲突，起因是政府未能举行选举，部分选举本应在2011年举行。

column1: English: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. = simplified Chinese: 太空舱大约会在早上 5 点（东部时间）到达地球，并进入大气层，为北加州、俄勒冈州、内华达州和犹他州的居民上演一场精彩的焰火秀。 ### English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这意味着可以有好几天完整时间来参观这座历史悠久的城市，然后晚上回到船上睡觉。
column3: 这意味着你可以在这个历史名城度过两天的完整时光，晚上再回到船上休息。

column1: English: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. = simplified Chinese: 壁球、空手道和旱冰运动以及棒球和垒球都曾试图进入奥林匹克项目，而后两个项目在 2005 年落选了。 ### English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!" = simplified Chinese:
column2: ”根据该电台的网站描述，这档节目是一档“带有全新震撼极客风格的老式广播剧！”
column3: 电台的网站描述这个节目是“老式广播剧，但加上了令人惊奇的新潮的怪癖”。

column1: English: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking. = simplified Chinese: 黑猩猩手脚的大小和长度相似，这反映出手在指背行走中用来承重的事实。 ### English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 科学的主要目的是通过科学方法找出世界的运行方式。实际上，这种方法可为大多数科学研究提供指导。
column3: 科学的主要目标是透过科学方法来了解世界是如何运作的。事实上，这个方法引导了大部分的科学研究。

column1: English: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production. = simplified Chinese: 随着镜头制造商在镜头生产方面达到更高的标准，这已经不算什么问题了。 ### English: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. = simplified Chinese: “弗雷德”目前正以每小时 105 英里（每小时 165 公里）的风速向西北方向移动。 ### English: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 对于那些计划怎么度过空档年的人来说，游学成为越来越受欢迎的选择。

column1: English: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp". = simplified Chinese: 简而言之，开车是一种很棒的自驾游方式，但它本身不太适合“露营”。 ### English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism. = simplified Chinese: 然而，在 1956 年 6 月，当波兰工人抗议食品短缺和减薪的骚乱演变成对共产主义制度本身的抗议时，赫鲁晓夫的承诺面临着考验。 ### English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在周四的东京电玩展上，任天堂总裁岩田聪发表主题演讲，公布了公司新一代任天堂 Revolution 游戏主机控制器的设计。

column1: English: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains). = simplified Chinese: 只有动物有脑（但也不是所有动物都有，比如水母就没有脑）。 ### English: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 然而，大多数指示牌都只使用加泰罗尼亚语，因为这是法律规定的第一官方语言。

column1: English: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. = simplified Chinese: 只要细心规划，普通汽车就能做到，但强烈建议使用四驱汽车，而且许多地方只有大轴距四驱汽车才能通过。 ### English: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. = simplified Chinese: 以最少击球次数或挥棒次数完成比赛的选手获胜。 ### English: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few. = simplified Chinese:

column3: 介绍野外生存的书和杂志很多，介绍战地生存的书却很少。

column1: English: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. = simplified Chinese: 陆克文先生决定签署《京都气候议定书》，这使得美国成为唯一没有签署该协议的发达国家。 ### English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. = simplified Chinese: 另一个例子是水。化合物水是由两个氢原子和一个氧原子组成的。 ### English: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 法国选举法为选举程序制订了相当严格的法规。

column1: English: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”. = simplified Chinese: 1977 年，达马迪安（Damadian）博士完成了第一台 “全身” 核磁共振扫描仪的制造，他称之为 “不屈号”。 ### English: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport. = simplified Chinese: 保持健康的能量平衡，坚持有效补充水分的习惯，了解合理使用营养补品的各个方面，能够帮助运动员们改善表现，增加运动乐趣。 ### English: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 108 碟珍馐奉纳（Chhappan Bhog）（在印度教中，Chhappan Bhog 指供奉神灵的56 种不同食物，其中包括糖果、水果、坚果、菜品等物）供奉给 Baba Shyam。
column3: 108盘素食斋饭(印度教中，为神灵供奉的56种食物，如甜点、水果、坚果、菜肴等)被送到“神医”那里。

column1: English: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. = simplified Chinese: 中国北京将成为 2022 年冬季奥运会的主办城市，这座城市也将因此成为第一个同时举办过夏季和冬季奥运会的城市。 ### English: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 取消政策各不相同，但截至三月末，大多数由于新冠病毒而出台的取消政策并没有延长到 2020 年 7 月——原定奥运会举办时间。
column3: 取消政策各不相同，但截至 3 月下旬，大多数与新冠病毒相关的取消政策都不适用于原定于 7 月举行的奥运会。

column1: English: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. = simplified Chinese: 几个世纪以来，人们在崎岖陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，这些山坡一直延伸到俯瞰大海的悬崖峭壁。 ### English: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在奥地利、德国、斯洛文尼亚、保加利亚、希腊和意大利之后，法国是第七个深受这种病毒之苦的欧盟国家。
column3: 法国是欧盟第七个受到这种病毒袭击的国家，此前奥地利、德国、斯洛文尼亚、保加利亚、希腊和意大利都受到袭击。

column1: English: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back. = simplified Chinese: 同样，挥手告别时，如果掌心向着挥手者自己（而不是向着要挥别的人），身处西班牙的英国游客可能会误以为这是请人回来的手势。 ### English: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. column1: English: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. = simplified Chinese: 在最新一期的月报中，石油输出国组织声称原油出口已经跌到了二十年来的最低水平，仅为一天 280 万桶。 ### English: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 因此，这种格式的宽高比（除以 12 得到最简单的整数比）便是 3:2。
column3: 这个格式的宽高比（除以十二得到最简单的整数比）因此被称为 3:2。

column1: English: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained. = simplified Chinese: 俄罗斯地面控制中心启动了飞机，空间站随即恢复正常姿态。 ### English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 空难在伊朗是司空见惯的事，这个国家的民用和军用飞机都已经老化，缺少维护。
column3: 伊朗的飞机失事率很高，其机队老旧，维护不善，无论是民用还是军用。

column1: English: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. = simplified Chinese: 瑞德先生最终驾驶新西兰 A1GP 汽车“黑美人”，以超过 160 千米每小时的速度七次穿过桥梁。 ### English: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 残奥会将于 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日举行。部分赛事将在日本其他地方举办。
column3: 残奥会将于 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日举行。一些比赛将在日本其他地区举行。

column1: English: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars. = simplified Chinese: 首先，新墨西哥州北部有严重的酒驾问题，并且小镇酒吧附近的司机酒驾的比例很高。 ### English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 大多数修道院都会为没有准备的女性提供裹身衣，但如果你自己带，尤其是颜色鲜艳的，门口的修道士会向你投来抿嘴一笑。
column3: 大多数修道院都会为没有准备的来访者提供披肩，但是如果你自己带了，尤其是颜色鲜艳的披肩，你将会得到修道院门口的僧侣或修女们的微笑。

column1: English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. = simplified Chinese: 在战争开始时，它们大多在海面上航行，但随着雷达的发展和精确度的提高，潜艇被迫潜入水下以免被发现。 ### English: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 北部与萨赫勒地区接壤；南部和西部临大西洋。
column3: 在北部，该地区被萨赫勒地区所包围，在南部和西部被大西洋所包围。

column1: English: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success. = simplified Chinese: 在初期军事失利之后，埃塞尔雷德终于与奥拉夫达成协议，奥拉夫重返挪威试图夺回王位，但算不上成功。 ### English: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 奥利弗·萨克斯 (Oliver Sacks) 在他的论文《总统的演讲》中指出，那些因为脑损伤而无法理解语言的人仍然能够准确地判断说话人是否有诚意。
column3: 奥利弗·萨克斯在他的论文《总统的演讲》中指出，由于大脑损伤而无法理解语言的人，仍然能够准确地判断出说话者的真诚度。

column1: English: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness. = simplified Chinese: 仅靠适当的营养实践并不足以造就出色表现，但这可以显著影响年轻运动员的整体健康状况。 ### English: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 大多数地区都能坐到舒适结实的日本 Coaster 小巴车。
column3: 大多数地区由小型日本城市巴士提供服务，这些巴士舒适且坚固。

column1: English: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack. = simplified Chinese: 然而，很少有皇家海军舰艇在潜在的入侵路线附近驻扎，因为海军将领们担心舰艇会被德国的空袭击沉。 ### English: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 很多情况下，在国外参加间隔年课程可以实质上提升你回国升学的机会。
column3: 在许多情况下，在国外参加一个间隔年课程实际上可以提高你回到祖国后进入高等教育的几率。

column1: English: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki. = simplified Chinese: 库克群岛没有城市，而是由 15 个不同的岛屿组成。主要的岛屿有拉罗汤加岛 (Rarotonga) 和艾图塔基岛 (Aitutaki)。 ### English: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他们往往比传统的团队成员拥有更多的自主权，因为他们的团队可能会针对不同的时区安排开会时间，而本地管理层可能不理解这一点。
column3: 他们往往比传统团队成员拥有更多的自主权，因为他们的团队可能根据不同的时区进行会议，而他们的本地管理者可能并不理解这些时区。

column1: English: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public. = simplified Chinese: 大多数电视节目都是为娱乐大众而制作的。 ### English: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 把滑雪路线想象成类似的徒步路线。
column3: 滑雪路线就像一条徒步旅行路线。

column1: English: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution. = simplified Chinese: 这些代理人负责根据《巴基斯坦宪法》第 247 条提供政府和司法服务。 ### English: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 浪漫主义具有很强的文化决定论色彩。这源于歌德、费希特和施莱格尔等作家。
column3: 浪漫主义具有很大的文化决定论成分，来自像歌德、费希特和施莱格尔这样的作家。

column1: English: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. = simplified Chinese: 旧金山开发了一个规模庞大的旅游基础设施，内设多家酒店、餐厅和一流的会议场所。 ### English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 通常情况下，参加这些教育类项目需要交学费。
column3: 通常，这些教育项目会收取学费。

column1: English: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. = simplified Chinese: 为了保护大峡谷，许可证限量发放。按启程月份算起提前四个月，在该月的第一天开始发放。 ### English: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 滑雪是许多滑雪爱好者的主要旅游活动，这些爱好者有时也被称为“滑雪狂人”，他们计划整个假期都在某个地点滑雪。
column3: 滑雪是许多人的主要旅游活动，许多滑雪爱好者会计划整个假期去滑雪。

column1: English: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. = simplified Chinese: 持有美国绿卡的古巴公民应访问厄瓜多尔领事馆获得对此要求的豁免。 ### English: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他们乘坐马车回到了巴黎，一群人包围了他们，大喊大叫地威胁国王和王后。
column3: 在马车上，他们回到了巴黎，周围是人群，他们高喊着对国王和女王的威胁。

column1: English: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. = simplified Chinese: 注意：对来自其他州的游客而言，这里的小镇酒吧并不总是闲逛的好地方。 ### English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 因此，很可能这个符号只是作为一个标签添加的。
column3: 所以，这个符号很可能是作为标签添加的。

column1: English: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. = simplified Chinese: 旅馆的客人大多是阿联酋公民。 ### English: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在 PALM 实验中，ZMapp 用作参照。也就是科学家将其作为基线，把其他三种治疗方法与之作比较。
column3: 在PALM试验中，ZMapp作为对照，意味着科学家们用它作为基准，并比较了其他三种治疗。

column1: English: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. = simplified Chinese: 约三千年后，也就是在1610年，意大利的天文学家伽利略·伽利莱（Galileo Galilei）使用望远镜观测天体，发现金星具有着与月球一致的相位。 ### English: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 其次，一些马鞍——尤其是英式马鞍——配有安全扣，如果落马的骑手向后拉，马镫皮带就会从马鞍上掉下来。
column3: 接下来，一些马鞍，特别是英式马鞍，具有安全带，允许马鞍上的马镫皮带在骑手摔倒时从马鞍上掉下来。

column1: English: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. = simplified Chinese: 谢长廷还声称马英九虽然很上镜，但中看不中用。 ### English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 咖喱饭菜是一道以香草和香料为主的菜肴，并配以肉类或蔬菜。
column3: 咖哩是一种以香料和香草烹调而成的菜肴，通常与肉类或蔬菜一起食用。

column1: English: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits. = simplified Chinese: 运动员可能会认为他们倾向于一个产品，尽管这个产品毫无益处。 ### English: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在浪漫主义的背景下，地理塑造了个体，随着时间的推移，与地理相关的习俗和文化出现了，这些习俗文化因为与社会所处的地方和谐相融，要比任意强加的法律好得多。
column3: 在浪漫主义背景下，地理塑造了个人，随着时间的推移，与地理相关的习俗和文化出现了，这些习俗和文化与社会的所在地相协调，比任意强加的法律更好。

column1: English: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee. = simplified Chinese: 作为众议院能源和商业委员会 (House Energy and Commerce Committee) 管理下的监督和调查小组委员会主席，斯特恩斯 (Stearns) 目前正在调查是否有利用税收通过计划生育资助堕胎的行为。 ### English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 所有的这些都成为了独立的学科，着重为现实生活中的问题提供解决方案。
column3: 这些东西已经成为了独立的学科，它们专注于提供解决现实生活问题的方案。

column1: English: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline. = simplified Chinese: 无论情况如何，你都必须直接打电话向航空公司订票。 ### English: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 老虎的咆哮不像狮子的咆哮那样深沉，而更像一句生气嘶吼的话语。
column3: 老虎的吼声不像狮子那样洪亮，而更像是一串粗声粗气的喊叫。

column1: English: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. = simplified Chinese: 土耳其的国土面积（包括湖泊）为 783,562 平方公里（300,948 平方英里），其中 755,688 平方公里（291,773 平方英里）位于西南亚，23,764 平方公里（9,174 平方英里）位于欧洲。 ### English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 地铁里的定期广播只有加泰罗尼亚语，但自动系统会用多种语言进行临时广播，包括西班牙语、英语、法语、阿拉伯语和日语。
column3: 地铁里的常规广播只使用加泰罗尼亚语，但遇到突发事件时，会使用自动广播系统用多种语言进行广播，包括西班牙语、英语、法语、阿拉伯语和日语。

column1: English: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. = simplified Chinese: 是否在居住的社区获得本地号码，这点没有要求；你可以在阿拉斯加奇金的野外获得卫星互联网连接，然后选一个号码，显示你位于阳光明媚的亚利桑那州。 ### English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 乘坐头等舱或商务舱最明显的方式是花一大笔钱来享受这种特权（或者，更好的方式是让你的公司给你出钱乘坐）。
column3: 乘坐头等舱或商务舱最简单的方法就是花一大笔钱（或者，更好的是，让你的公司为你做这件事）。

column1: English: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. = simplified Chinese: 第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战期间都使用了潜水艇。 那时它们的速度很慢，射击范围也非常有限。 ### English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 目前还没有发布海啸预警。根据雅加达地质局的说法，由于此次地震没有达到 6.5 级，因此不会发布海啸预警。
column3: 没有发布海啸警报，根据雅加达地球物理局，因为这次地震没有达到6.5级，所以不会发布海啸警报。

column1: English: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. = simplified Chinese: 土耳其的面积在世界上排第 37 位，大约是法国本土和英国面积的总和。 ### English: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 尽管那里没有海啸的威胁，当地居民却感到坐立不安，纷纷结束生意及离开家园。
column3: 尽管没有海啸威胁，居民们开始恐慌，纷纷离开自己的生意和家园。

column1: English: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. = simplified Chinese: 尽管这绝不是现代才出现的现象，但大多数人很可能会将其与年轻人使用喷漆破坏公共和私有财产联系起来。 ### English: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这在中学毕业生中尤其流行，他们可以在上大学前抽出一年的时间，又不影响他们接受教育。

column1: English: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court. = simplified Chinese: 目前既不知道将会被指控何种罪名，也不知道当局是如何认定这个男孩有犯罪嫌疑的，但联邦法院已经开始进行少年犯诉讼程序。 ### English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. column1: English: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. = simplified Chinese: 如果你过桥或沿着瀑布附近蜿蜒的小径走，肯定会被弄湿。 ### English: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states. = simplified Chinese: 造成这种现象的主要原因是清晰的梦境延长了快速眼动状态之间的时间间隔。 ### English: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 大众汽车保有量较高还会导致更高的道路交通事故发生率，而这将推动发明用于修复伤者伤处的全新医疗技术。
column3: 汽车的大量拥有也导致道路上发生更多的交通事故，这导致了对受损身体进行修复的新医疗技术的发明。

column1: English: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. = simplified Chinese: 最受欢迎的区域比如幽灵牧场 (Phantom Ranch) 附近的光明天使 (Bright Angel) 露营地，通常在第一天开放预订时就会收到满额预订申请。 ### English: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 公园占地 19500 平方公里，分为 14 个不同的生态区，为不同的野生动植物提供支持。
column3: 公园面积19,500平方公里，分为14个不同的生态区，每个生态区都支持不同的野生动物。

column1: English: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail. = simplified Chinese: 法官告诉布莱克，他的入狱“几乎是铁定的”。 ### English: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower. = simplified Chinese: 变焦镜头的另一个缺点是镜头的最大光圈（速度）通常较小。 ### English: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. = simplified Chinese: 在不了解当地动物群的地区，切勿睡在地上的床垫或垫子上。 ### English: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在 2010 年联邦大选之前曾对 1,400 名受访者做过调查，受访者中反对澳大利亚成为共和国的人数自 2008 年以来增长了 8%。
column3: 在2010年联邦大选前，有1400人接受调查，其中反对澳大利亚成为共和国的人数增加了8%。

column1: English: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. = simplified Chinese: 正如上文所提，虽然“爱斯基摩人”这个词在美国仍然可以接受，但北极地区的许多非美籍人士，尤其是对加拿大人来说，他们都认为这个词带有贬义含义。 ### English: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 狮子是群居属性最明显的猫科动物，生活在称为狮群的大型群体中。

column1: English: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. = simplified Chinese: 房客们开始聊起身边趣闻，这时大部分涉事家庭突然意识到，OHA 的卡罗琳·威尔逊私吞了他们的押金，溜出城去了。 ### English: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human. = simplified Chinese: 有时起初的触发原因是太阳让雪变暖，有时是因为降雪多了些，有时是因为其他自然事件，但更常见的原因往往是人为因素。 ### English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 此外，在革命之后，官职面向全体男性开放申请，这使得最有抱负、最成功之人有机会飞黄腾达。

column1: English: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. = simplified Chinese: 1965 年 3 月 18 日，他完成了首次载人舱外活动（ EVA，俗称“太空漫步”），在航天器外独自维持了 12 分钟多一点。 ### English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 现年 53 岁的库莫（Cuomo）从今年年初开始担任州长，并于上个月签署了一项将同性婚姻合法化的法案。
column3: 53 岁的库莫（ Cuomo ）于今年年初开始担任州长，并于上个月签署了一项法案，使同性婚姻合法化。

column1: English: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992." = simplified Chinese: 1992 年，普罗文扎诺（Provenzano）结束了由里亚纳发动的反政府的战争，这场战争夺去了黑手党十字军乔瓦尼·法尔科内（Giovanni Falcone）和保罗·博尔塞利诺（Paolo Borsellino）的生命，随后这些老大们就被他控制住了。“ ### English: The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. = simplified Chinese: 旧金山的经济与自身是世界级旅游胜地这一点有关，但旧金山的经济却是多元化的。 ### English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). = simplified Chinese: 南半球没有一家航空联盟的航线能横跨全部三个大洋（天合联盟甚至没有跨洋航线）。 ### English: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. column1: English: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. = simplified Chinese: 除了确认今天的逮捕外，官方几乎没有发布任何其他信息。 ### English: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. = simplified Chinese: 北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市的优势之一在于它为家庭提供了许多高质量的选择。 ### English: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children". = simplified Chinese: 这不是学习能力缺失，而是学习障碍；这“影响着全美儿童的 3% 到 5%，人数可能多达 200 万”。 ### English: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 该海湾曾在 1889 年发生过一场臭名昭著的海军对峙，当时来自德国、美国和英国的七艘舰船拒绝驶离这个海湾。

column1: English: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce. = simplified Chinese: 2007年9月17日，纳迪亚在俄罗斯阿莱克斯的一家妇产科诊所的剖腹产出生，体重达17磅1盎司。 ### English: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. = simplified Chinese: 报告显示，考试成绩提升速度快得令人难以置信，并称学校内部发现了问题，但没有根据这一发现采取行动。 ### English: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children. = simplified Chinese: 有小孩的家庭可能需要做更多的准备，但即使带着婴儿和学龄前儿童，在户外待一天也不难。 ### English: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. = simplified Chinese: 在大多数国家，你需要一份你希望就读的学校的录取通知书，以及证明你有至少第一年课程所需资金的文件。 ### English: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. = simplified Chinese: 抗议还发生在巴黎、保加利亚的索非亚、立陶宛的维尔纽斯、马耳他的瓦莱塔、爱沙尼亚的塔林以及苏格兰的爱丁堡和格拉斯哥。 ### English: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago. = simplified Chinese:

column3: 科学家们希望了解行星是如何形成的，特别是地球是如何形成的，因为彗星很久以前就撞击了地球。

column1: English: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors = simplified Chinese: 在欧洲探险者到来后的短短几年里，西班牙征服者就大大削减了泰诺斯的人口 ### English: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. = simplified Chinese: 请放心，在到达码头后，一切都会顺其自然。你会遇到其他要搭便船的人，他们会与你分享信息。 ### English: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 纳米比亚（Namibian）总统和议会选举的最后结果表明，现任总统希菲克普耶·波汉巴（Hifikepunye Pohamba）以巨大的优势再次当选。

column1: English: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. = simplified Chinese: 在他的笔记中，他使用了一些家长认为粗俗的词语，据称他也在课堂上讲过脏话。 ### English: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 更传统的教堂常常在复活节周末的周六晚上举行复活节守夜活动，会众通常在午夜钟声敲响之时涌入庆典，庆祝基督的复活。
column3: 传统的教堂往往会在复活节周末的周六晚上举行复活节守夜，信徒们往往会在午夜钟声敲响时欢呼庆祝基督的复活。

column1: English: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. = simplified Chinese: 冰川并不是稳定的，而会从山上流下来。这会导致出现裂缝和冰裂隙，而这些裂隙可能会被雪桥掩盖。 ### English: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 海地正义与民主研究所 (Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy) 引用的独立研究表明，是尼泊尔的联合国维和部队在不知情的情况下将这种疾病带到了海地。

column1: English: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety. = simplified Chinese: 要检查受害者，你必须先勘察现场，确保自身的安全。 ### English: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. = simplified Chinese: 旅馆的客人大多是阿联酋公民。 ### English: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. = simplified Chinese: 这些高原通常被称为 “vidde”，意思是广阔的、开放的、没有树木的空间，是一片浩瀚无垠的区域。 ### English: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place." = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit. = simplified Chinese: 其他科学家认为这些植物有毒，所以恐龙不太可能吃它们，即便现在树懒和其他动物例如鹦鹉（恐龙的后代）可以吃有毒的叶子或水果。 ### English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. column1: English: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. = simplified Chinese: 对于那些不熟悉医学术语的人来说，”传染性”和“触染性”这两个词的含义截然不同。 ### English: Ocelots like to eat small animals. column1: English: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. = simplified Chinese: 在最新一期的月报中，石油输出国组织声称原油出口已经跌到了二十年来的最低水平，仅为一天 280 万桶。 ### English: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. = simplified Chinese: 沙发冲浪成立于 2004 年 1 月。在那之前，计算机程序员凯西·芬顿 (Casey Fenton) 找到了飞往冰岛的廉价航班，但却没有住所。 ### English: The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky. = simplified Chinese: 地球上的各个角落都有动物的身影。它们有的在地下挖洞，有的在海洋中畅游，有的在天空中翱翔。 ### English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 早先于全球发布的华硕 Eee PC 个人笔记本，因成本节约及功能性因素，成为 2007 年台北 IT 资讯月备受瞩目的话题。
