column1: English: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate. = simplified Chinese: 中长跑是一项花费相对低廉的运动；然而参与者对所需的几件装备却有很多误解。 ### English: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 文明是一种由共同生活、合作工作的人群（社会）所共享的单一文化。
column3: 文明是人们共同生活及其行为的准则和规范，是人类文化发展到一定阶段的产物；是较为先进的物质文化和精神文化的总和，是人类社会进步的重要标志。

column1: English: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. = simplified Chinese: 运河区（荷兰语：Grachtengordel）是阿姆斯特丹宾嫩斯塔 (Binnenstad) 周围著名的 17 世纪老城区。 ### English: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 罗宾·乌萨帕 (Robin Uthappa) 取得了本局的最高分，投出了 11 个四分球和 2 个六分球，仅投出 41 个球便赢得 70 分。
column3: 鲁宾·乌塔卡在 41 球中打出了 70 分的最高单局得分，其中 11 个四分球和 2 个六分球。

column1: English: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. = simplified Chinese: 尽管短期访问某些国家时，旅游或商务出行并不需要签证，但留学生去那里的话，所待的时间通常需比休闲的游客要长。 ### English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在群岛和湖泊之中，游艇并不是必需的。
column3: 在群岛和湖泊中，你不一定需要一艘游艇。

column1: English: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. = simplified Chinese: 宝云岛是适合一日游或周末游的人气目的地，当地提供皮划艇、徒步旅行、商店、餐馆等旅游项目和服务。 ### English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这些地区人口稀少，一般不存在光污染的问题，你也能欣赏到璀璨星空。
column3: 由于人口稀少，因此光污染问题并不严重，您也可以欣赏到星空。

column1: English: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. = simplified Chinese: 高耸于马丘比丘北端的这座陡峭的山峰，常常会成为许多遗址照片的背景。 ### English: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements. = simplified Chinese: 看到这种活动，殖民者也要求了增援。 ### English: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如果冬季去北极或南极地区旅游，你就能体验到极夜，即一段时间内太阳不会从地平线上升起。
column3: 如果你到北极或南极地区在冬天，你会经历极夜，这意味着太阳不升起在水平线以上。

column1: English: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. = simplified Chinese: 因为呼叫是通过互联网路由的，因此你不必使用位于你居住地或旅行地点的通话公司。 ### English: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 该理论认为，一个星系周围的大多数暗物质都处在星系周围的某种光环中，由许多小粒子组成。
column3: 这个理论说，围绕一个星系的暗物质大部分位于星系的晕中，是由许多小粒子组成的。

column1: English: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE. = simplified Chinese: 亚历山大大帝原本提议重建这座神庙，但其提案遭到拒绝。随后，在亚历山大死后，该神庙于公元前 323 年得以重建。 ### English: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 然而，仅为少数汽车架设全国公路网，这在经济上并不可行，因此新的生产方式应运而生，以求降低汽车的拥有成本。
column3: 然而，仅靠少数几辆车，国家级的公路网在经济上并不可行，因此，新的生产方法被开发出来，以降低汽车拥有成本。

column1: English: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile. = simplified Chinese: 野生动物有的怕人，有的具有攻击性。环境可能寒冷、炎热或恶劣。 ### English: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这个术语源于人们对臭虫的熟悉，臭虫是一种非常适应寄生于人类的昆虫。
column3: 这个词源自对臭虫的熟悉，臭虫是一种高度适应寄生在人类身上的昆虫。

column1: English: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. = simplified Chinese: 旧金山的经济与自身是世界级旅游胜地这一点有关，但旧金山的经济却是多元化的。 ### English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 与这个节日有关的许多传统也被基督教国家的非信徒和世界各地的非基督徒所接受。
column3: 圣诞节的许多传统习俗，也被非基督徒的国家和世界上非基督徒所采纳。

column1: English: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. = simplified Chinese: 旅舍主要为年轻人提供服务，二十岁左右的年轻人便是其典型客户，但你也可以经常在那里遇到相对年长的人。 ### English: Farther south is Niagara Falls and the north is home to the untapped natural beauty of the Muskoka and beyond. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 再往南是尼亚加拉大瀑布，往北则是马斯科卡河 (Muskoka) 及河对面未开发的自然美景。
column3: 尼亚加拉瀑布位于加拿大南部，而北部则拥有未经开发的马斯科卡和更远处的自然美景。

column1: English: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping. = simplified Chinese: 詹姆斯·尤因将军率 700 名民兵在特伦顿渡口渡河，占领了阿森皮克湾上的桥梁，阻断了敌军逃跑的路径。 ### English: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 哥特式风格在 10 - 11 世纪到 14 世纪达到顶峰。
column3: 哥特式建筑风格在10世纪到11世纪和14世纪达到顶峰。

column1: English: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. = simplified Chinese: 沿着一条平缓的小径远足一天几乎不需要什么准备，并且任何人只要身体不算差，都可以享受远足的乐趣。 ### English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 一种名为 ZMapp 的“抗体鸡尾酒”（多抗体联合）最初有望在该领域发挥作用，但正式研究表明，它在预防死亡方面的效果有些不尽人意。
column3: 一种抗体混合物，ZMapp，最初在现场显示了一些希望，但正式的研究表明它比预期的要少地预防死亡。

column1: English: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. = simplified Chinese: 在家时，由于会经常接触当地病菌，你极易对其产生免疫力。 ### English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 录像的使用为阐释微表情（持续几毫秒的面部运动）带来了重大发现。
column3: 视频记录的使用，使得微表情的研究取得了重要进展，微表情是持续几毫秒的面部表情。

column1: English: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. = simplified Chinese: 修正议案在 2011 年就在两院通过了。 ### English: Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 较小的岛屿大多是独立国家，或所属于法国，它们以豪华海滩度假胜地而闻名。
column3: 多数小岛都是独立国家，或与法国有联系，并作为豪华海滩度假胜地而闻名。

column1: English: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. = simplified Chinese: 科学家把这一过程称为“受激辐射”，因为原子受到强光的刺激，引起光子的发射，而光也是辐射的一种。 ### English: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 阿根廷以拥有世界顶尖的马球队和球员而闻名。
column3: 阿根廷以拥有一支世界一流的马球球队和球员而闻名。

column1: English: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. = simplified Chinese: 几周前，议员兼律师马基斯·特里安塔菲洛普洛斯在阿尔法电视台的热门电视节目《Zoungla》中公布了这一消息，随后彼得罗斯·曼图瓦洛斯因其办公室成员涉嫌非法贪污受贿而被革职。 ### English: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他一直无法用药物来缓解疼痛，因为比赛禁止参赛者服用这些药物。
column3: 他无法获得参加奥运会的药物，因为那些药物被禁止。

column1: English: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. = simplified Chinese: 21 岁的杰西（Jesus）于 2017 年 1 月从巴西的帕尔梅拉斯足球俱乐部加盟曼城，据报道其转会费为 2700 万英镑。 ### English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如果你需要时间考虑价格是否合适，或者去往目的地需要获取其他证件（如签证），他们可以为你保留预订。
column3: 他们也可以帮你保留预订，如果你需要时间考虑报价或为目的地准备其他文件（比如签证）。

column1: English: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things. = simplified Chinese: 这是你需要永远记在心上的一点，这样才能避免失望或者甚至对当地的做法表示厌恶。 ### English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这并不是丢人的事情：这和很多人对其他东西抱有的恐惧和厌恶没什么两样。
column3: 这不是什么可耻的事情：这和其他很多人对很多事情的恐惧和厌恶没什么不同。

column1: English: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. = simplified Chinese: 如果你愿意，请想象一个曼彻斯特人、一个波士顿人、一个牙买加人和一个悉尼人围坐在多伦多的一家餐馆里吃饭。 ### English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 水果点心很常见，苹果全年都能用来做点心，夏天还能吃到樱桃和李子。
column3: 水果点心很常见，苹果一年四季都做成点心，樱桃和梅子只在夏天出现。

column1: English: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second. = simplified Chinese: 马鲁基多尔 (Maroochydore) 已经遥遥领先，以六分的优势领先第二名的努沙 (Noosa)。 ### English: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 亚马逊河占全世界所有河流的入海流量的 20%。

column1: English: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. = simplified Chinese: 当地时间上午 9:30 左右 (UTC 0230)，JAS 39C 鹰狮战斗机撞上跑道并发生爆炸，导致机场关闭，商业航班无法正常起降。 ### English: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. = simplified Chinese: 古墓里的巨额财富已不在墓中，而是转移到了开罗的埃及博物馆。 ### English: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. = simplified Chinese: 在赛道上热身时，伦茨 (Lenz) 从自行车上摔了下来，然后被跟在后面的赛车手泽维尔·扎亚特 (Xavier Zayat) 撞到。 ### English: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 尽管“吉普赛”一词应用广泛，尤其在非罗姆人当中更为盛行，但它通常被认为是一种冒犯，因为它与负面的刻板印象和对罗姆人错误的看法相关联。

column1: English: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. = simplified Chinese: PBS 电视台的这个节目荣获二十多项艾美奖，其播出历史仅次于《芝麻街》和《罗杰斯先生的左邻右舍》。 ### English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. = simplified Chinese: 这些岩石中的十五块来源于去年七月份的流星雨。 ### English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 二进制数只能占两个值里的其中一个，即0或者1，而这样的数被称为二进制数字，即计算机术语中的“位”。

column1: English: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. = simplified Chinese: 纳达尔（Nadal ）在比赛中把 88% 的净胜分收入囊中，在第一个发球局赢得 76 分。 ### English: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. column1: English: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. = simplified Chinese: 在巴蒂亚东部的一次伏击中，英军俘虏了意大利第十军的工程兵司令拉图西将军。 ### English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. = simplified Chinese: 这些高原通常被称为 “vidde”，意思是广阔的、开放的、没有树木的空间，是一片浩瀚无垠的区域。 ### English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan. = simplified Chinese: 印度河流域文明是青铜时代的文明，位于印度西北部次大陆，覆盖的区域包括了现代巴基斯坦的大部分地区，以及印度西北部和阿富汗东北部的一些地区。 ### English: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities." = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. = simplified Chinese: 世宗大王为朝鲜王朝的第四任君主，也是最受推崇的君主之一。 ### English: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. = simplified Chinese: 只要细心规划，普通汽车就能做到，但强烈建议使用四驱汽车，而且许多地方只有大轴距四驱汽车才能通过。 ### English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them. = simplified Chinese: 发生表面张力的原因，是水面的水分子之间互相强烈吸引，它们之间的引力比与水分子与上方空气分子之间的吸引力要大。 ### English: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. = simplified Chinese: 一些德国修道士想让上帝更接近本国人，所以他们发明了爱沙尼亚文字语言。 ### English: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这更像是物质的四种状态（顺序不分手）：固体、液体、气体和等离子体，不过他也提出了理论，认为它们会转变成新的物质，构成我们所看到的事物。

column1: English: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. column1: English: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day. = simplified Chinese: 乐队的经纪公司是香港管理公司（HK management Inc.），该公司在 9 月 20 日最初取消演出活动时并未给出原因，转天却将之归咎于后勤保障原因。 ### English: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. column1: English: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. = simplified Chinese: 在加拿大，格陵兰岛的土著居民称自己为因纽特人，在格陵兰岛则称自己为 Kalaalleq（复数为 Kalaallit），也就是“格陵兰人”的意思。 ### English: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. = simplified Chinese: 通常来说，较长时间停留在外国需要提前获取签证。 ### English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 大多数对技术决定论的解释都包括这两个总体思路：一是技术本身的发展在很大程度上超越了文化或政治影响，二是技术反过来会对社会产生不受社会条件制约的内在“影响”。

column1: English: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. = simplified Chinese: 龙卷风是一股气压极低的旋转气流柱，它能将周围的空气向内、向上吸入。 ### English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在 1789 年 10 月 6 日，受到惊吓的国王路易十六、王后玛丽·安托瓦内特和他们的两个孩子（11 岁的玛丽·特蕾莎和 4 岁的路易斯·查尔斯），以及国王的妹妹伊丽莎白夫人，被一群集市妇女从凡尔赛赶回了巴黎。
column3: 惊恐的路易十六、玛丽·安托瓦内特王后、他们的两个年幼的孩子（11岁的玛丽·特蕾莎和4岁的路易-查理）和国王的妹妹，伊丽莎白夫人，于1789年10月6日被一群女商贩从凡尔赛宫赶回巴黎。

column1: English: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. = simplified Chinese: 据报道，人类感染禽流感的病例不到 一千例，但其中有一些病例是致命的。 ### English: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 毕竟，领导者对团队的成败负有最终责任。
column3: 毕竟，领导最终要对团队的成功和失败负责。

column1: English: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. = simplified Chinese: 在吃树干之前，三角龙会用它强有力的喙嘴剥去树叶。 ### English: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 科学家表示，这种动物的羽毛顶部为栗棕色，底部为浅色或胡萝卜色。

column1: English: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels. = simplified Chinese: 一名腰缠万贯的旅客可能会考虑乘飞机环游世界，并在旅途中陆续入住许多家这样的酒店。 ### English: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 记住，虽然主舞台上的音乐可能已经结束，但节日的其他部分可能会一直演奏音乐到深夜。
column3: 请记住，尽管主舞台上的音乐可能已经结束，但整个音乐节仍会持续到深夜。

column1: English: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story. = simplified Chinese: 只要给一点点钱，你就能让一些孩子讲这个故事。 ### English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这种沉积物是形成沙洲和海滩的必要条件，而沙洲和海滩是野生动物的栖息地。
column3: 这沉积物是用来形成沙丘和沙滩的，这些沙丘和沙滩是野生动物的栖息地。

column1: English: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. = simplified Chinese: 基本上，它们可分为两类：要么边旅行边工作，要么尽量减少开支。这篇文章着重于后者。 ### English: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 然而，广泛耐药结核病在整个结核病患者群体中所占的比例似乎仍然很低；在南非，在任意特定时刻，总计 33 万人中只有 6000 人感染。
column3: 然而，XDR-TB在整个结核病患者群体中所占的比例仍然很低；南非的330万结核病患者中，只有6000人感染了XDR-TB。

column1: English: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. = simplified Chinese: 它经常出现在音乐、电影、文学和流行文化中，使得这座城市及其地标闻名于世。 ### English: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 马略卡岛的菜肴和地中海相似地区的菜肴一样，主要以面包、蔬菜和肉类（尤其是猪肉）为基础，而且完全使用橄榄油。

column1: English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . = simplified Chinese: 热带气旋风暴古努（以马尔代夫语中一种以棕榈叶编织的袋子命名），在最高峰时风速可达每小时 240 千米（每小时 149 英里）。 ### English: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate." = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他在一次采访中表示，这个新变种“非常令人不安和担忧，因为它的致死率非常高。”

column1: English: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. = simplified Chinese: 据说该男子驾驶一辆装有炸药的三轮车驶进了人群当中。 ### English: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 人工智能有很强的科幻色彩，但它其实是计算机科学非常重要的一个分支，研究的是机器的行为、学习和智能适应。

column1: English: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment. = simplified Chinese: 随着时间的推移，许多德语外来词与原有词汇合并。这就是启蒙运动的开始。 ### English: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 每天早上，人们驾车离开小乡镇上班，路上和他们擦肩而过的人的工作地点正是他们离开的地方。
column3: 每天早晨，人们从小城镇坐车去上班，而他们上班的地方，正是他们刚刚离开的地方。

column1: English: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W. = simplified Chinese: “弗雷德”是卫星图像问世以来，在大西洋南部和东部记录到的最强热带气旋，也是有记录以来西经 35° 以东地区的第三大飓风。 ### English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 当一小群生物（一个小种群）与它们本来的主要种群分离时（比如它们跨过山脉和河流，或者它们到了一个新的岛屿以至于不可能轻易回去)，它们通常会发现自己所处的环境与之前不同。
column3: 当一个小的生物群落（小种群）从它们原来所在的种群（比如，如果它们穿过山脉或河流，或者如果它们迁移到一个新的岛屿，使得它们很难返回）分离出来时，它们常常会发现自己处于一个与原来不同的环境中。

column1: English: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. = simplified Chinese: 瑞德先生最终驾驶新西兰 A1GP 汽车“黑美人”，以超过 160 千米每小时的速度七次穿过桥梁。 ### English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts". = simplified Chinese:
column2: 它可以做得很薄，粘在其他金属上，由于达到如此之薄，有时可以用于装饰被称为“彩饰手抄本”的书本里的手绘图画。
column3: 它可以非常薄，并且粘附到其他金属上。它可以被制成如此之薄，以至于有时被用来装饰手绘书籍中的画作，这些画作被称为“手稿”。

column1: English: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot. = simplified Chinese: 他们用各自独特的口音和当地的土语讲述家乡的故事，逗彼此开心。 ### English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 人们自古以来就知道金、银、铜等基本化学元素，因为这些元素都能以自然形态在自然界中发现，而且比较容易使用原始工具进行开采。
column3: 人们很早就知道黄金、白银和铜等基本化学元素，因为这些元素在自然界中能以天然形式存在，而且用原始工具就能开采。

column1: English: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse. = simplified Chinese: 如果你想帮助别人时受伤，你只会使事情变得更糟。 ### English: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. = simplified Chinese: 这支舰队由奥拉夫·特里格瓦松率领。他是挪威人，志在将挪威从丹麦手中夺回来。 ### English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese. = simplified Chinese: 旧金山也是在美国品尝韩国菜、泰国菜、印度菜和日本菜等其他亚洲菜的好去处。 ### English: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University). = simplified Chinese: 磁共振成像依据的是一种叫核磁共振 (NMR) 的物理现象，它是费利克斯·布洛赫（在斯坦福大学工作）和爱德华·珀塞耳（来自哈佛大学）于 20 世纪 30 年代发现的。 ### English: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 突变会添加新的基因变异，而选择则会从表达的基因变异池中把变异移除。
column3: 突变会增加基因变异，而选择会从基因变异的池子中剔除掉它。

column1: English: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs. = simplified Chinese: 锡克教徒把自己的宗教称为 Gurmat，在旁遮普语中是“古鲁（导师）之路”的意思。古鲁是所有印度宗教的基本组成部分，但在锡克教中地位特别高，成为了锡克教信仰的核心。 ### English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry. = simplified Chinese: 委内瑞拉是石油净出口国，尽管只有百分之一的人在石油行业工作，但石油行业仍然是该国的重要产业。 ### English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research. = simplified Chinese:

column3: 实验不是唯一的，实验是用来排除一个或多个可能假设的测试，提出问题，并观察也引导科学研究的。

column1: English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. = simplified Chinese: 如果连拍照都不允许的话，就更不用想拍摄视频了。 ### English: Ottawa is Canada's charming, bilingual capital and features an array of art galleries and museums that showcase Canada's past and present. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. = simplified Chinese: 今天，坠机地点已经确定。由于交通不便，两名警察通过直升飞机吊索进入丛林，徒步前往现场搜救幸存者。 ### English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial". = simplified Chinese: 欧胡岛（Oahu）的降雨量达到了 6.34 英寸，被称为“有益的”。 ### English: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300). = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you. = simplified Chinese: 如果您正在开车穿越亚热带雨林，在您进入车内时车门敞开的几秒钟时间里，也足以让蚊子与您一起钻进车里。 ### English: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 佩里表示，他会“返回得克萨斯，评估今晚党团会议的结果，明确自己在这次较量中是否有胜算的余地”。但后来他又表示会继续参加竞选，并参加于 1 月 21 日在南卡罗莱纳州举行的初选。
column3: 佩里表示，他将“返回得克萨斯州评估今晚的初选结果，确定自己是否还有在初选中获胜的希望”，但随后又表示，他将留在初选的竞争中，参加1月21日在南卡罗来纳州举行的初选。

column1: English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . = simplified Chinese: 热带气旋风暴古努（以马尔代夫语中一种以棕榈叶编织的袋子命名），在最高峰时风速可达每小时 240 千米（每小时 149 英里）。 ### English: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 恐龙的羽毛并没有发育良好的主干——这称为“羽轴”，但还是有羽毛的其他特征，比如羽枝和羽小枝，研究人员推断羽轴的进化可能比这些其他特征晚。

column1: English: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. = simplified Chinese: 我们中有很多人，都发现自己观看的电视节目在告诉我们某种过程或经验，但我们却永远不会参与或应用这些知识。 ### English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. = simplified Chinese: 鞋纹应该足够深，在5 毫米（1/5英寸）或以上；材料应在低温下足够柔软。 ### English: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. column1: English: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life". = simplified Chinese: 实际上，细胞在生物研究中有着如此基础和关键的地位，以至于它们常被称为“生命的基本单位”。 ### English: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." = simplified Chinese:
column2: 报道称他年仅 20 多岁。比伯发表声明表示：“虽然我当时并不在场，也没有直接经历这起悲惨事故，但我仍为死者家属感到悲伤，为他们祈祷。”
column3: 据报道，他当时20岁左右。在一份声明中，比伯说，“虽然我当时不在现场，也没有直接参与这场悲剧，但我的想法和祈祷与受害者的家人同在。”

column1: English: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. = simplified Chinese: 世界博览会（俗称万国博览会，简称世博）是一场展示艺术和科学的国际盛会。 ### English: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 该团队正在寻找的效应可能是由星系暗物质和银河系暗物质之间的潮汐力引起的。
column3: 团队想要的效果是由星系暗物质和银河系暗物质之间的潮汐力引起的。

column1: English: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). = simplified Chinese: 如果旅行时随身携带笔记本电脑或平板电脑，在内存或磁盘中存储一份副本（无需网络也可访问）。 ### English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 小心不要让衣服变得太热（这可能会产生收缩现象，在极端情况下会把衣服烤焦）。
column3: 注意不要让织物过热（这可能导致收缩，或者在极端情况下，烧焦）。

column1: English: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society. = simplified Chinese: 然后该理论确立了这样一种观点：毛利人从波利尼西亚乘“大船”迁移，并从莫里奥里人手中夺取了新西兰，建立了一个农业社会。 ### English: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这一发现也有助于深入了解鸟类羽毛的进化。
column3: 该发现还提供了对鸟类羽毛演化的洞察。

column1: English: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times. = simplified Chinese: 学习者可以使用互联网和万维网随时获取信息。 ### English: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 克鲁格国家公园 (KNP) 位于南非东北部，东部与莫桑比克接壤，北部与津巴布韦接壤，南部以鳄鱼河 (Crocodile River) 为边境。
column3: 克鲁格国家公园位于南非东北部，沿莫桑比克边界的东部，津巴布韦北部，南部边界是鳄鱼河。

column1: English: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. = simplified Chinese: 现代溜冰鞋的刀刃是双刃的，刃与刃之间有一个凹洞。双刃对冰有更好的抓力（即使是在倾斜的时候）。 ### English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 尽管 Winfrey 在告别时热泪盈眶，但她向粉丝们明确表示，她还会回来。
column3: 虽然奥普拉在告别时泪流满面，但她向她的粉丝们保证她还会回来。

column1: English: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun. = simplified Chinese: 这是指人们去一个与他们日常生活截然不同的地方进行放松和娱乐。 ### English: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical. = simplified Chinese:
column2: pH 值以被测化学品中的氢（pH 中的 H）离子数量表示。
column3: 酸碱度用氢离子的含量来表示。

column1: English: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. = simplified Chinese: 尽管你可能会听到格陵兰本地人用这个词，但外国人应该避免使用。 ### English: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 仅仅两个星期，美国和自由法国的军队就解放了法国南部，并转向德国。
column3: 在仅仅两周内，美国人和自由法国军队就解放了法国南部，并转向德国。

column1: English: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system. = simplified Chinese: 不过，所有说法语的比利时人和瑞士人都会在学校里学习标准法语，所以即使您使用标准的法国度量系统，他们也能听得懂。 ### English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这个新的环境有不同的资源和不同的竞争对手，所以新的种群将需要不同的特征或适应能力来成为一个强有力的竞争对手，而不是它们之前所需要的那些。
column3: 这个新的环境有不同的资源，也有不同的竞争对手，所以新的居民需要不同的特征或适应才能成为强大的竞争对手，而他们以前不需要这些。

column1: English: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. = simplified Chinese: 没有人比博贝克 (Bobek) 的出场次数更多、为俱乐部进球得分更多的了。 ### English: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 自 1966 年以来，孙德尔本斯一直是野生动物保护区。据估计，目前该区生活着 400 只皇家孟加拉虎和大约 3 万只梅花鹿。
column3: 自从1966年以来，Sundarbans一直是一个野生动物保护区，估计现在有400只皇家孟加拉虎和大约30000只斑点鹿在那个地区。

column1: English: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. = simplified Chinese: 你的酒店或房东（如果住在民宿或私人民宅）可能配有 wifi 或可联网的电脑。所有安置点都有一家网吧或有公共 wifi 的地方。 ### English: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta". = simplified Chinese:
column2: 当地主要的啤酒是“一号”啤酒。它的口感不复杂，但很好喝、很清爽。另一款本地啤酒叫做“曼塔 (Manta)”。
column3: 当地主要啤酒是“一”，它不是一种复杂的啤酒，但令人愉快和清爽。另一种当地啤酒叫“曼塔”。

column1: English: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. = simplified Chinese: 因为呼叫是通过互联网路由的，因此你不必使用位于你居住地或旅行地点的通话公司。 ### English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 如果骑手从马上被甩下来，但有一只脚卡在马镫上，那么马在奔跑时可能会拖着他走。为了将这种风险降至最低，可以采取一些预防措施。
column3: 如果骑手从马背上摔下来，但脚被马镫卡住，如果马跑开，他们可能会被拖走。为了减少这种风险，可以采取一些安全措施。

column1: English: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. = simplified Chinese: 1994 年，阿塞拜疆的亚美尼亚族纳戈尔诺—卡拉巴赫地区向阿塞拜疆人发动了战争。 ### English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 英国早在 16 世纪就修建了货车道。
column3: 早在16世纪，英国就修建了铁路。

column1: English: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. = simplified Chinese: 在大多数国家，你需要一份你希望就读的学校的录取通知书，以及证明你有至少第一年课程所需资金的文件。 ### English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 净水的方法有很多，有些对特定的污染更有效。

column1: English: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan. = simplified Chinese: 让我们先来解释一下意大利的计划。意大利基本上属于德国和日本的“小兄弟”。 ### English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 据报道，大约有 60 起 iPod 发生故障、机身过热的情况，共造成 6 起火灾，4 人轻微烧伤。
column3: 已有60多起iPod过热故障报告，导致6起火灾，4人受轻伤。

column1: English: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day. = simplified Chinese: 在迁徙阶段，行军蚁在夜间出行，白天停下来安营。 ### English: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 梵蒂冈城在法律法规和官方通信中使用意大利语。

column1: English: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. = simplified Chinese: 三角龙的牙齿不仅能咬碎树叶，还能咬碎非常坚硬的树枝和树根。 ### English: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在国际制裁下，伊朗无法购买新的飞机。
column3: 国际制裁使新飞机无法购买。

column1: English: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky. = simplified Chinese: 地球上的各个角落都有动物的身影。它们有的在地下挖洞，有的在海洋中畅游，有的在天空中翱翔。 ### English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 神经生物学数据为认知研究的理论方法提供了物理证据。因此，它缩小了研究范围，并使研究更加精确。
column3: 神经生物数据为理论研究提供了物理证据，因此它缩小了研究范围，使研究更加精确。

column1: English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. = simplified Chinese: 比利时和瑞士使用的法语语种与法国使用的法语尽管非常相似，可以互通，但还是稍有不同。 ### English: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 蒙得维的亚位于亚热带地区；在夏季月份，气温常常超过 30°C 。
column3: 蒙得维的亚位于亚热带地区，夏季气温经常超过30°C。

column1: English: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. = simplified Chinese: 格罗姆寺位于暹粒市西南 12 公里处。这座山顶寺庙建于 9 世纪末耶输跋摩国王统治时期。 ### English: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. = simplified Chinese: 我们所经历的时间是一系列从未来到现在再到过去的事件。 ### English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 区域性和季节性的恶劣天气现象包括暴风雪、雪暴、冰暴和沙尘暴等。
column3: 地区性和季节性的严重天气现象包括暴风雪、雪暴、冰暴、沙尘暴。

column1: English: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices. = simplified Chinese: 在某些国家或某些类型的商店，至少有一家餐厅（通常是非正式的）的价格相当实惠。 ### English: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 裂变原子弹的工作原理如下：把一个原子核和许多质子及中子聚在一起需要能量。
column3: 裂变炸弹的工作原理是，它需要能量来使许多质子和许多中子结合在一起。

column1: English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing. = simplified Chinese: 尽管如此，世界上还是有许多独特的咖啡饮用方式，这些方式都值得去体验。 ### English: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 每年规模最大的锦标赛于 12 月份在拉斯卡尼塔斯 (Las Cañitas) 的马球场举行。

column1: English: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance. = simplified Chinese: 可以根据需要购买产品，但大多数产品对成绩几乎没有实际影响。 ### English: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 我们同意美国奥委会的声明，与其吊销执照，不如在我们组织内部继续推进有意义的变革，可能更有利于维护运动员和俱乐部的利益及其运动。
column3: 我们同意美国奥委会的声明，认为我们的运动员和俱乐部，以及他们的运动，可能更适合通过在我们的组织中进行有意义的改变来前进，而不是取消认证。

column1: English: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge. = simplified Chinese: 在冰川的边缘，巨大的冰块会松动、掉落，也许还会跳到或滚到离边缘更远的地方。 ### English: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: An inquiry was established to investigate. = simplified Chinese: 已经展开调查。 ### English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: An inquiry was established to investigate. = simplified Chinese: 已经展开调查。 ### English: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built? = simplified Chinese: 但是我们的想象有现实依据吗？最初为什么要建城堡？它们是如何设计和建造的？ ### English: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 身为国家安全顾问，他曾协助卡特处理诸多国际事务，例如 1978 年签署《戴维营协议》；在20 世纪 70 年代末实现美中关系正常化；1979 年导致伊朗人质危机的伊朗革命；1979 年苏联入侵阿富汗。

column1: English: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong. = simplified Chinese: 这种思维模式最重要的因素是：正确答案只有一个。你只需考虑两个答案，即对的或者是错的。 ### English: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 周二，总理斯蒂芬·哈珀（ Stephen Harper ）在其办公室与新民主党党魁杰克·林顿（ Jack Layton ）举行 25 分钟的会议后，已经同意将政府的《清洁空气法》送交一个多党委员会审查，然后再进行二读。

column1: English: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. = simplified Chinese: 宝云岛是适合一日游或周末游的人气目的地，当地提供皮划艇、徒步旅行、商店、餐馆等旅游项目和服务。 ### English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在南非勒斯滕堡（Rustenburg）皇家巴福肯体育场举行的英式橄榄球联盟三国赛中，南非队击败了全黑队（新西兰）。

column1: English: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route. = simplified Chinese: 在该市的备用线路即环城高速公路上，没有出现严重的交通延误。 ### English: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one." = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card". = simplified Chinese: 马生于香港，曾就读于纽约大学和哈佛大学法学院，还一度持有美国永久居民身份证“绿卡”。 ### English: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. column1: English: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. = simplified Chinese: 翻译引擎有了显著的改进，现在经常提供或多或少正确的翻译（而更多情况是很少有胡言乱语），但需要注意的是，他们仍然可能会完全翻错。 ### English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. = simplified Chinese: 在他的笔记中，他使用了一些家长认为粗俗的词语，据称他也在课堂上讲过脏话。 ### English: This type of manager has difficulty making unpopular decisions, performing disciplinary action, performance evaluations, assigning responsibility, and holding people accountable. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. = simplified Chinese: 许多珍稀动物很难找到，公园有时也有针对商业摄影的规定。 ### English: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation. = simplified Chinese: 患有多动症的孩子很难专心做事，例如做作业，但他们能够集中精力做自己喜欢的事情，比如玩游戏，看喜欢的卡通片，或者写一些不加标点符号的句子。 ### English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. column1: English: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. column2: 他随后被转送到剑桥的阿登布鲁克医院。

column1: English: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. = simplified Chinese: 南极穿越公路 (South Pole Traverse)（或高速公路）始于罗斯海的麦克默多站 (McMurdo Station)，直通南极点，全长 1600 公里。 ### English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 自然风光旅游业吸引了那些对自然地区感兴趣的游客，他们前来观赏包括野生动植物在内的自然风景。
column3: 自然旅游吸引人们到自然地区去欣赏风景，包括植物和动物。

column1: English: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances. = simplified Chinese: 罗马帝国的军国主义性质促进了医学的进步和发展。 ### English: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 也可以到北部参观法蒂玛圣母院（圣地），它是举世闻名的圣母玛丽亚显现之地。
column3: 还要向北参观大法蒂玛圣母圣殿(圣堂),这是一个闻名世界的圣母显灵的地方。

column1: English: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. = simplified Chinese: 现场被捕的主持人否定了袭击，并声称有多达三十个人向他投掷瓶子，他用棍子是为了不让自己受到伤害。 ### English: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 他接受过产科医生培训，从 1959 年开始在奥克兰国家妇女医院工作。
column3: 他于1959年开始在奥克兰国家妇女医院工作，并接受过助产士的培训。

column1: English: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. = simplified Chinese: 要游览加拉帕戈斯群岛的景点和野生动植物，最好的交通方式就是乘船。查尔斯·达尔文在 1835 年就是乘船游览此地的。 ### English: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan." = simplified Chinese:
column2: 卡米尔·圣桑 (Camille Saint-Saens) 创作的法国歌剧讲述的是一名艺术家的故事，“他一生沉迷于毒品和对日本的热爱”。
column3: 法国歌剧“参孙与达丽拉”讲述了这样一个故事：一个艺术家“他的生活被毒品和日本的爱情所主宰”。

column1: English: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. = simplified Chinese: 现代教育集团指控他未经授权就在公交车上刊登大型广告，并谎称自己是首席英语教师。 ### English: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在美国的各个地区，约有 40 万例多发性硬化症 (MS) 病例，这一疾病已经成为中青年的主要神经系统疾病。
column3: 在美国，大约有四万个多发性硬化症病例，使该病成为年轻和中年人群中神经疾病的主要疾病。

column1: English: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. = simplified Chinese: 卢森堡一直试图成为中立国，但它在第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战中都曾被德国占领。 ### English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 任何孩子都不应该在一个没有教养、没有关爱、没有教育的环境中成长，但事与愿违。
column3: 每个孩子都不应该在一个不关心、不爱护、不教育的环境中成长，但事实并非如此。

column1: English: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis. = simplified Chinese: 1970 年，医学博士兼研究科学家雷蒙德·达马迪安 (Raymond Damadian) 发现了使用磁共振成像作为医学诊断工具的基础原理。 ### English: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 虚拟团队需要坚持与传统团队同样的质量标准，但也有细微的差别。
column3: 虚拟团队必须达到与传统团队相同的卓越标准，但存在微妙差异。

column1: English: "Some may not agree but I don't care. = simplified Chinese: “有些人可能不同意，但我不在乎。” ### English: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 由议长约翰·汉考克和秘书长查尔斯·汤姆逊签署的手写草案在7月4日得到大陆议会批准，之后被送到几个街区以外的约翰·邓拉普印刷厂付印。
column3: “在国会通过后，由国会主席约翰·汉考克和秘书查尔斯·汤姆森签署的手写草案，被送往几条街外的约翰·邓拉普印刷厂。”

column1: English: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. = simplified Chinese: 谢长廷在选举期间暗示，马英九在遇到危机时可能会逃离台湾。 ### English: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 摆脱湍急水流之后，游回来就没有那么困难了。
column3: 出了水，游回去跟平常一样。

column1: English: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. = simplified Chinese: 使用几百个小时后，灯丝最终被烧坏，而灯泡也不亮了。 ### English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 它的长下颚上布满了 70 多颗剃刀般锋利的牙齿，上颚上还有一排。这意味着任何与它相遇的东西都无路可逃。
column3: 它长长的嘴里布满了70多颗锋利的牙齿，加上它嘴的上方还有一排牙齿，因此，任何东西都别想从它嘴里逃掉。

column1: English: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village). = simplified Chinese: 朱克杰宗（Drukgyal Dzong）是一座已毁的堡垒和佛教寺庙，位于帕罗区上部（在方德村）。 ### English: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 因此，铅笔一问世，就成了许多人的心头好。
column3: 因此，铅笔对许多人来说，当它出现时，是一个很好的朋友。

column1: English: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left. = simplified Chinese: 这样一来，溜冰者就可以转弯。冰刀向右倾斜，溜冰者就转向右边。冰刀向左倾斜，溜冰者就转向左边。 ### English: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 随着中世纪走向末期，西欧人民逐渐发展出自己的风格。当时最大的进步之一就是十字军东征后，人们开始用纽扣来系衣服。
column3: 中世纪末期，欧洲开始发展自己的风格。其中一个最大的发展是十字军东征的结果，人们开始使用纽扣来固定衣服。

column1: English: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline. = simplified Chinese: 无论情况如何，你都必须直接打电话向航空公司订票。 ### English: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 该群岛位于南极半岛以北 120 公里处。最大的岛屿是乔治国王岛，这里是“繁星村（Villa Las Estrellas）”的定居点。
column3: 群岛位于半岛以北120公里处。群岛中最大的岛是乔治王岛，岛上有一个名叫“星星村”的居民点。

column1: English: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. = simplified Chinese: 注意：对来自其他州的游客而言，这里的小镇酒吧并不总是闲逛的好地方。 ### English: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 相比之下，动物性食物（蚂蚁、白蚁、蛋）不仅容易消化，而且能提供大量蛋白质，里面含有全部必需的氨基酸。
column3: 与之相反，动物食品（蚂蚁，白蚁，鸡蛋）不仅容易消化，而且提供高蛋白，含有所有必需氨基酸。

column1: English: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. = simplified Chinese: 超过 60 艘游船在加拉帕戈斯群岛（Galapagos）水域定期往返——这些游船的体量从可承载 8 人到 100 人不等。 ### English: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 基什内尔女士在阿根廷大剧院宣布她有意参加总统竞选，2005 年也是在这里，她作为布宜诺斯艾利斯省代表开始竞选参议员。
column3: 克里斯蒂娜在阿根廷剧院宣布她将竞选总统，她 2005 年竞选参议员时也是在这里宣布的。

column1: English: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces. = simplified Chinese: 这款游戏以第二次费卢杰（Fallujah）战役为背景，这是美军和伊拉克军队之间的一场恶战。 ### English: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 生物钟是能够自我维持的摆动装置，即使在没有外界提示的情况下，也会持续一段时间自由运转的周期。
column3: 生物钟是一种自我维持的振荡器，即使在没有外部提示的情况下，也会继续自由运行。

column1: English: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. = simplified Chinese: 纳达尔（Nadal ）在比赛中把 88% 的净胜分收入囊中，在第一个发球局赢得 76 分。 ### English: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 坠机发生在高海拔山区，据称是敌方火力所致。
column3: 坠机事件发生在山区地形，据信是敌对火力造成的。

column1: English: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. = simplified Chinese: 在国家独立初期，新加坡植物园发挥其专业知识所长，帮助该岛成为了一座热带“花园城市”。 ### English: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 例如，有人可能会说，汽车必然会促进道路的发展。
column3: 例如，可以说汽车必然导致道路的发展。

column1: English: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. = simplified Chinese: 陆克文先生决定签署《京都气候议定书》，这使得美国成为唯一没有签署该协议的发达国家。 ### English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 至于愿不愿意签发没有注明性别 (X) 的护照，或愿不愿为了符合想要的姓名和性别而更改文件，各国政府的意愿各不相同。
column3: 各国政府愿意为没有性别说明的护照（X）或者希望名字和性别一致的证件更新，其意愿各不相同。

column1: English: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. = simplified Chinese: 旅游对人数较多的旅行团来说比较便宜。如果你独自一人或只有一个朋友同行，不妨试着认识其他人，组建 4 到 6 人的旅行团，这样可以获得更优惠的人均价格。 ### English: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 35 毫米格式的实际尺寸是 36 毫米宽，24 毫米高，这样格式其实有点令人困惑。
column3: 35mm 格式其实是 36mm 宽、24mm 高。

column1: English: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. = simplified Chinese: 截至周三下午，油箱的排气口仍在漏油，这很可能是由油箱内部的热膨胀造成的。 ### English: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 孙德本尔斯 (Sundarbans) 是世界上最大的滨海红树林带，林带长 80 公里（50 英里），从海岸一直延伸至孟加拉国和印度内陆。
column3: 孟加拉湾是世界上最大的沿海红树林带，从海岸线向内陆延伸80公里(50英里)。

column1: English: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. = simplified Chinese: 消防指挥系统的例行测试引发了一场电力故障，故障使得安全阀开启，导致原油于格里利堡（Fort Greely）第 9 泵站附近溢出。 ### English: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 据报道，由于执法人员不在场，比什凯克街道上的大规模抢劫持续了一夜。
column3: 据报道，昨晚，在比什凯克市，警察不在街上，因此发生了广泛的抢劫。

column1: English: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. = simplified Chinese: 在夏天，这里的四十余个基地会迎来几千名工作人员，其中的大多数人驻扎在此地区；一小部分人留下越冬。 ### English: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 《独立宣言》背面写着“Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776（《独立宣言》原件，1776 年 7 月 4 日）”的字样。文字写在文件底部，是倒过来的。
column3: 独立宣言的背面写着“美利坚合众国独立宣言，1776年7月4日”。这句话出现在独立宣言的底部，倒着写。

column1: English: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk. = simplified Chinese: 有些人不把驼鹿当成潜在的危险，可能会靠得太近，将自己置于危险之中。 ### English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added. = simplified Chinese: 它是在德语字母表中加了一个字母“Õ/õ”。 ### English: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 藏传佛教以佛陀的教义为基础，但通过大乘佛教的普世之爱和印度瑜伽的许多技巧得到了拓展。
column3: 藏传佛教是佛教的延伸，但主要是通过大乘的慈悲和许多印度瑜伽的技术。

column1: English: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary. = simplified Chinese: 这也是一个节省预算的好方法，可以在某处待更长时间，因为很多志愿者工作提供食宿，有些工作还有少量工资。 ### English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在哈尔达斯维克村 (Haldarsvík) 可以欣赏附近依斯特洛伊岛 (Eysturoy) 的美景。村中有一个与众不同的八角形教堂。
column3: 哈尔达斯维克村可以欣赏到附近岛屿埃斯特维的景色，并有一个独特的八角形教堂。

column1: English: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. = simplified Chinese: 在原计划第二次接近进行着陆前约十分钟，它消失了。 ### English: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 7 月下旬报告了本季节的第一批病例。

column1: English: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. = simplified Chinese: 非洲联盟贸易和工业专员艾伯特·穆坎加宣布贝宁将加入联盟。 ### English: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. = simplified Chinese:
column2: “他在 2000 年制作的第 1000 张邮票取材自大卫·克洛克·埃伦斯特拉尔的名画《瑞典国王的伟大功绩》，并因此入选《吉尼斯世界纪录大全》。”
column3: 他的第1000枚邮票是2000年发行的瑞典国王大卫·克勒克尔·埃伦斯特勒的大作，被收录在吉尼斯世界纪录大全中。

column1: English: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864). = simplified Chinese: 这样一来，分辨率几乎达到了 35 mm 底片（3136 mm2 对 864）的四倍。 ### English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. = simplified Chinese: 所以如果你站在海岸线旁边，就能看到底部的各类鹅卵石或泥状物。 ### English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. = simplified Chinese: 异步通讯让人们有时间思考他人的反应并作出反应。 ### English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 家山羊通常被成群放牧在山上或其他牧区，它们通常由牧山羊人（大多为儿童或青少年）照管，牧山羊人与更广为人知的牧羊人类似。这些放牧方法至今仍在使用。
column3: 羊群一般被放养在山上或其它放牧区，经常由牧童或少年看管。这种放牧方式至今仍在使用。

column1: English: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti = simplified Chinese: 多米尼加共和国（西班牙语：República Dominicana）是一个加勒比国家，地处伊斯帕尼奥拉岛的东半部分，该岛分属多米尼加与海地两国 ### English: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 一些动物（例如大象和长颈鹿）往往喜欢挨近汽车，而标准的设备可以让人更好地欣赏。

column1: English: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. = simplified Chinese: 除了导演电影，沃蒂埃的成就还包括 1973 年为反对他眼中的政治钳制而发起的绝食抗议。 ### English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. column1: English: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. = simplified Chinese: 许多人梦想着人类有一天可以移民到其他星球，探索其他世界。有些人想知道宇宙有什么；有些人相信其他行星上可能有外星人或其他生命。 ### English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 有些原子含有不稳定的原子核，这意味着它们很可能会在很少或没有刺激的情况下发生分裂。
column3: 一些原子核不稳定，这意味着它们很容易在没有推动的情况下分解。

column1: English: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. = simplified Chinese: 自创办以来，《洋葱报》已经成为一个名副其实的讽刺戏仿类新闻帝国，旗下拥有印刷刊物、网站（10 月份吸引了 500 万独立访问者）、个人广告、24 小时新闻网络、播客，以及近期推出的名为《我们的愚蠢世界》的世界地图集。 ### English: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 2015 年年末， TogiNet 创建了 AstroNet 广播作为子电台。
column3: 2015 年底，TogiNet 成立了 AstroNet 电台，作为旗下的一个分支机构。

column1: English: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under". = simplified Chinese: 由于和夏威夷处于同一时区，这些岛屿有时被认为是“南方的夏威夷”。 ### English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 到了 1939 年 9 月 17 日，波兰的防线已经被攻破，剩下的唯一希望就是沿着罗马尼亚桥头堡撤退和改编军队。
column3: 1939年9月17日，波兰的防御已经崩溃，唯一的希望就是撤退并重组在罗马尼亚桥头堡。

column1: English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. = simplified Chinese: 幸存者弗朗齐歇克·科瓦尔说：“终于有一块玻璃碎了，他们开始从窗户逃出去。” ### English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在希腊克里特岛和圣托里尼米诺斯城市的房屋中发现了污水系统的遗迹。
column3: 克里特岛和圣托里尼岛上的米诺亚城市遗址中发现了下水道系统遗迹。

column1: English: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days. = simplified Chinese: 这种游牧性的横冲直撞行为每次都会持续 17 天左右。 ### English: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 香港岛是香港地区的代名词，也是众多游客心目中的焦点所在。
column3: 香港岛是香港的名称来源，也是许多游客认为的主要景点。

column1: English: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them. = simplified Chinese: 发生表面张力的原因，是水面的水分子之间互相强烈吸引，它们之间的引力比与水分子与上方空气分子之间的吸引力要大。 ### English: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在这些动乱时期，各路诸侯为争夺王位而发生激烈战争。
column3: 在这些时期，许多贵族为了争夺王位而进行了激烈的战争。

column1: English: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over. = simplified Chinese: 十年之后，他领导了阿波罗-联盟号任务的苏联部分，这标志着太空竞赛已经结束。 ### English: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 联合国维和人员在 2010 年地震后抵达海地，他们因疫情蔓延而受到指责。疫情是从部队营地附近开始扩散的。
column3: 联合国维和部队，他们到达海地地震后，被指责为传播疾病，该疾病始于部队营地附近。

column1: English: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things. = simplified Chinese: 这是你需要永远记在心上的一点，这样才能避免失望或者甚至对当地的做法表示厌恶。 ### English: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 周一，法国东部里昂附近的沼泽内发现了一只死野鸭。经证实，这只野鸭感染了对人类致命的 H5N1 型禽流感病毒。
column3: 致命的人类禽流感病毒H5N1型，已经确认感染了一只周一在里昂附近湿地发现的死野鸭。

column1: English: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. = simplified Chinese: 溪降时要进入峡谷的底部，峡谷可以是干涸的，也可以有很深的水。 ### English: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 在某些航线上，大型公司有自己的飞机，但对于其他航线和小公司来说，就有问题了。
column3: 有些路线，大的公司有自己的飞机，但对于其他路线和较小的公司来说，这是一个问题。

column1: English: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. = simplified Chinese: 在国家独立初期，新加坡植物园发挥其专业知识所长，帮助该岛成为了一座热带“花园城市”。 ### English: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 和谐的职场氛围至关重要，强调团队的努力，而不是表扬个人成就。
column3: 营造和谐的工作环境至关重要，强调团队合作而不是个人成就。

column1: English: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. = simplified Chinese: 由于在 2007 年次贷危机期间遭到曝光，北岩银行 (Northern Rock) 曾请求政府提供援助。 ### English: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 我对人们说的是：我们怎么对待你，你就怎么对待我们。
column3: 我对人们说，你们对待我们，就跟我们对待你们一样。

column1: English: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. = simplified Chinese: 该函必须经厄瓜多尔外交部批准，并符合某些要求。 ### English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002). = simplified Chinese:
column2: 适当使用博客，可以使学生变得更善于分析和进行思辨；通过积极回应网络材料，学生们可以在他人文章的上下文语境中找到自己的立场，并能够针对特定问题提出自己的观点（Oravec, 2002）。"
column3: 博客的适当使用可以增强学生分析与批判的能力；通过积极回应互联网材料，学生可以界定自己在其他文章中的立场，并阐明自己对特定问题的观点。

column1: English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. = simplified Chinese: 上周，裸体新闻 (Naked News) 宣布将推出三档新的广播节目，以此大幅增加其在新闻报道中的国际语言授权。 ### English: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 英镑一般在岛上所有地方都通用，斯坦利境内也往往可以用信用卡和美元付款。
column3: 英镑 (British pounds) 在群岛各地一般都能接受，斯坦利 (Stanley) 镇内信用卡和美元也经常能接受。

column1: English: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). = simplified Chinese: 然而，上面列出的几乎所有赌场都供应饮料，其中一些赌场还提供知名的娱乐活动（主要是紧邻阿尔伯克基和圣达菲的大型赌场）。 ### English: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 跳羚队以五连败收官。
column3: 对于南非队来说，这结束了他们五连败的记录。

column1: English: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. = simplified Chinese: “巴拿马文件” 是巴拿马莫萨克·冯塞卡律师事务所 (Mossack Fonseca) 约 1,000 万份文件的总称，这些文件在 2016 年春季被爆料给媒体。 ### English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 查科 (Chaco) 地区是瓜伊库鲁 (Guaycuru) 和帕亚瓜 (Payagua) 等其他土著部落的家园，他们靠狩猎、采集和捕鱼为生。
column3: 查科地区还生活着其他一些土著部落，如瓜伊丘鲁 (Guaycurú) 和帕亚瓜 (Payaguá)，他们靠狩猎、采集和捕鱼为生。

column1: English: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam. = simplified Chinese: Lockwood Gardens 的租户认为，可能还有 40户 甚至更多的家庭面临被驱逐的命运，因为他们了解到，奥克兰住房管理局的警察还在调查奥克兰其他可能陷入房屋骗局的公房。 ### English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 对于各个年龄和背景的人来说，乘飞机旅行都可能成为恐怖的经历，尤其是在以前从未乘坐过飞机或有过痛苦经历的情况下。
column3: 乘飞机旅行对所有人来说，尤其是对那些从未乘过飞机或经历过创伤事件的人来说，都是一种令人害怕的经历。

column1: English: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels. = simplified Chinese: 一名腰缠万贯的旅客可能会考虑乘飞机环游世界，并在旅途中陆续入住许多家这样的酒店。 ### English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 基督教的主要信条之一是财富应该用来减轻痛苦和贫困，而教会的货币基金就是专门为此而设立的。
column3: 基督教的一个主要教义是财富应该用来减轻痛苦和贫穷，而教堂的财政资金就是为了这个目的而存在的。

column1: English: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism. = simplified Chinese: 也许最常见的旅游类型，也是大多数人一想到旅游就会想到的：休闲旅游。 ### English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 古代文明和部落开始驯养它们，食用和使用它们的奶、肉、毛和皮。
column3: 古代文明和部落开始饲养它们，以便随时取用牛奶、毛发、肉和皮毛。

column1: English: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. = simplified Chinese: 在夏天，这里的四十余个基地会迎来几千名工作人员，其中的大多数人驻扎在此地区；一小部分人留下越冬。 ### English: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 波兰男子视障滑雪选手马切吉·克雷泽尔（Maciej Krezel ）和向导安娜·奥加津斯卡（Anna Ogarzynska）在超级大回转比赛中获得第十三名，韩国选手朴钟硕（Jong Seork Park）在男子坐式超级大回转比赛中获得第二十四名。
column3: 波兰男子视力障碍滑雪运动员马切伊·克雷斯尔和向导安娜·奥加尔兹卡娅在超级大回转项目中排名第十三。韩国男子坐姿滑雪运动员全石洙在男子坐姿超级大回转项目中排名第二十四。

column1: English: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. = simplified Chinese: 对于那些不熟悉医学术语的人来说，”传染性”和“触染性”这两个词的含义截然不同。 ### English: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 罗斯贝数越小，恒星在磁场倒转方面就越不活跃。
column3: 罗素数越小，恒星越不活跃，磁极反转越少。

column1: English: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. = simplified Chinese: 出发前和旅途中，你必须考虑到很多方面。 ### English: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 很多情况下这和症状疗法很相似。但是，如果我们不仅仅想要一个临时的解决方案的话，那么我们就应该找到问题的根源，并把它彻底根除。
column3: 这就像许多情况下采取的对症治疗。然而，如果我们想要的不仅仅是临时的解决办法，那么我们就应该找到问题的根源，并消除它们。

column1: English: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. = simplified Chinese: 多年来，人们使用过很多不同的胶片格式。标准 35mm 胶片（36x24mm 底片）是最常见的。 ### English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 还有许多社会和政治影响，例如度量单位的使用、从专制到共和制的转变、民族主义、相信国家不属于唯一的统治者而是属于人民。
column3: 有很多社会和政治影响，例如使用公制系统，从绝对主义到共和主义，民族主义和认为国家属于人民，而不是属于一个君主。

column1: English: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers. = simplified Chinese: 研究发现，抑郁、恐惧以及把病情灾难化的情绪，在腰疼患者的疼痛和残疾中起到了中介作用。 ### English: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 降雪、飘雪、车窗上的水珠或结冰可能也会挡住视线。
column3: 雪崩或风吹雪也可能使能见度受限，车窗上的水汽或冰也会影响能见度。

column1: English: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. = simplified Chinese: 北岩银行在 2008 年被收归国有，此前有消息称，该公司获得了英国政府的紧急援助。 ### English: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 旅游警示只能就当地局势提供简略摘要。
column3: 告警只是对一个国家政治局势的简要概述。

column1: English: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. = simplified Chinese: 北岩银行在 2008 年被收归国有，此前有消息称，该公司获得了英国政府的紧急援助。 ### English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 其中一封于 7 月 6 日寄给了乔治·华盛顿，华盛顿于 7 月 9 日在纽约向他的军队宣读了这封信。一份副本于 8 月 10 日抵达伦敦。
column3: 一份于 1777 年 7 月 6 日送达乔治·华盛顿，他于 9 日将其读给纽约的部队。一份副本于 8 月 10 日送达伦敦。

column1: English: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon. = simplified Chinese: 他还确认，他赞成默示隐私权，而这默示隐私权是罗伊（Roe）案件的裁决依据。 ### English: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 最终，木轮被铁轮所取代。1767 年，第一条全铁轨道问世。

column1: English: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children". = simplified Chinese: 这不是学习能力缺失，而是学习障碍；这“影响着全美儿童的 3% 到 5%，人数可能多达 200 万”。 ### English: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity. = simplified Chinese: 该理论反驳了月球上不存在任何地质活动的说法。 ### English: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 与西方人习惯的工作文化相比，日本人的工作文化中等级制度更明显，更加正式。

column1: English: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. = simplified Chinese: 这支舰队由奥拉夫·特里格瓦松率领。他是挪威人，志在将挪威从丹麦手中夺回来。 ### English: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. = simplified Chinese: 如果连拍照都不允许的话，就更不用想拍摄视频了。 ### English: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. = simplified Chinese:

column3: 不管它们看起来多么温顺，野牛、麋鹿、驼鹿、熊，以及几乎所有的野生动物都会攻击。

column1: English: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season. = simplified Chinese: 斯图尔特、戈登 、肯塞斯和哈维克在本赛季还剩四场比赛的情况下，进入车手积分榜前十名。 ### English: Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 有点像推着一辆笨重的小推车上山。再次分裂原子核，然后释放一些能量。
column3: 类似于推一辆重车上山。将核子分裂成两半，然后释放出一些能量。

column1: English: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. = simplified Chinese: 北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市的优势之一在于它为家庭提供了许多高质量的选择。 ### English: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 作为一项运动，高山滑雪至少可以追溯到 17 世纪，1861年，挪威人在澳大利亚开设了第一家休闲滑雪俱乐部。

column1: English: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties. = simplified Chinese: 信徒们寻求一种对神圣的现实/神性或诸神的直接体验、直觉或者顿悟。 ### English: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices. = simplified Chinese: 该全球组织已经使用英语和日语进行报道，目前正在为电视、网络和移动设备推出西班牙语、意大利语和韩语节目。 ### English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. = simplified Chinese: 日本柔道选手、两枚奥运会金牌得主齐藤仁 (Hitoshi Saito) 逝世，享年 54 岁。 ### English: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. = simplified Chinese: 许多情绪稳定、能力较强的旅客都曾被在发展中国家旅行的新问题所吓倒，在那里，需要迅速适应接踵而至的许多细微文化差异。 ### English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations. = simplified Chinese:

column1: English: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses. = simplified Chinese: 变焦镜头的缺点是，要想实现一定的焦距范围，所需的焦距复杂度和透镜元件的数量远远大于定焦镜头。 ### English: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. = simplified Chinese:

column2: 亚里士多德就所有科学领域的问题（包括心理学在内）所发表的观点都被一一接纳。
column3: 当时，亚里士多德关于所有科学领域的观点，包括心理学，都被接受。

column1: English: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus. = simplified Chinese: 公元前 356 年 7 月 21 日，赫洛斯塔图斯 (Herostratus) 的纵火行为导致位于以弗所 (Ephesus) 的阿尔忒弥斯神庙毁于一旦。 ### English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 激励内容理论的核心是寻找令人认同或产生兴趣的因素。
column3: 内容理论关注的是人们为什么喜欢某些东西。

column1: English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. = simplified Chinese: 费利西亚 （Felicia） 曾经是萨菲尔-辛普森 （Saffir-Simpson） 飓风级别的 4 级风暴，周二消散前减弱为热带低气压。 ### English: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 我们用植物做房子，用植物做衣服。我们吃的大部分食物都是植物。没有植物，动物就不能生存。
column3: 我们用植物建造房屋，用植物做衣服。我们吃的大部分食物都是植物。没有植物，动物就无法生存。

column1: English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. = simplified Chinese: 比利时和瑞士使用的法语语种与法国使用的法语尽管非常相似，可以互通，但还是稍有不同。 ### English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 该系列赛的最后一场比赛将于下周在约翰内斯堡 (Johannesburg) 的埃利斯公园举行，届时斯普林博克斯 (Springboks) 将迎战澳大利亚队。
column3: 下一周，南非队将在约翰内斯堡的埃利斯公园球场迎战澳大利亚队，以结束此次世界杯系列赛。

column1: English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. = simplified Chinese: 上周，裸体新闻 (Naked News) 宣布将推出三档新的广播节目，以此大幅增加其在新闻报道中的国际语言授权。 ### English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 要说明社会化的重要性，最常用的方法之一是利用少数不幸儿童的案例。这些儿童由于被忽视、遭遇不幸或遭到故意虐待，在成长过程中没有在成年人的帮助下实现社会化。
column3: 说明社会化重要性的最常见的方法之一就是通过讲述那些不幸的、由于疏忽、不幸或故意虐待而没有得到社会化教育的孩子的例子。

column1: English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing. = simplified Chinese: 尽管如此，世界上还是有许多独特的咖啡饮用方式，这些方式都值得去体验。 ### English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 这些资金可以用于建造防洪房屋、改善水资源管理以及促进农作物多样化。
column3: 这些钱可以用来建造防洪房屋，改善水管理，以及作物多样化。

column1: English: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening. = simplified Chinese: 到今天早些时候，风速为每小时 83 公里左右，预计会不断减弱。 ### English: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 可以在岛上唯一的银行兑换货币，该银行位于斯坦利，在 FIC West 商店对面。
column3: 岛上唯一一家银行位于斯坦利，就在 FIC 西店对面。

column1: English: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. = simplified Chinese: 李博士还对感染了 H5N1 禽流感病毒的土耳其儿童尚未发病的报道表示关切。 ### English: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures. = simplified Chinese:
column2: 切勿在建筑物上做标记或涂鸦，以免破坏遗址。
column3: 不要在建筑物上乱涂乱画或刻上刻痕。
